trans-unit.target: Modbus请求通常由描述 FunctionCode 的单个字节和有效负载的N个字节组成

trans-unit.source: A Modbus specific protocol error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生一个Modbus特定协议错误。

trans-unit.source: A MorphTarget type is a convenience type, which provides a list of Attributes, which the MorphingAnimation uses to animate geometry. A MorphTarget can also be created based on existing Geometry.
trans-unit.target: 甲MorphTarget类型是一个方便的类型，它提供的列表属性，其MorphingAnimation用途进行动画的几何形状。也可以基于现有的Geometry创建MorphTarget 。

trans-unit.source: A MorphTarget type is a convenience type, which provides a list of Attributes, which the MorphingAnimation uses to animate geometry. A MorphTarget can also be created based on existing Geometry.
trans-unit.target: 甲MorphTarget类型是一个方便的类型，它提供的列表属性，其MorphingAnimation用途进行动画的几何形状。也可以基于现有的Geometry创建MorphTarget 。

trans-unit.source: A MorphingAnimation type implements blend-shape morphing animation to a target GeometryRenderer. The MorphingAnimation sets the correct Attributes from the morph targets to the target GeometryRenderer::geometry and calculates interpolator for the current position. The actual blending between the attributes must be implemented in the material. MorphPhongMaterial implements material with morphing support for phong lighting model. The blending happens between 2 attributes - 'base' and 'target'. The names for the base and target attributes are taken from the morph target names, where the base attribute retains the name it already has and the target attribute name gets 'Target' appended to the name. All morph targets in the animation should contain the attributes with same names as those in the base geometry.
trans-unit.target: MorphingAnimation类型将混合形状变形动画实现到目标GeometryRenderer。MorphingAnimation将正确的属性从变形目标设置为目标GeometryRenderer :: geometry并计算当前位置的插值器。属性之间的实际混合必须在材料中实现。MorphPhongMaterial实现具有对Phong照明模型的变形支持的材质。混合发生在2个属性之间-“基本”和“目标”。基本属性和目标属性的名称取自变形目标名称，其中基本属性保留其已经拥有的名称，并且目标属性名称被附加在名称后的“目标”。动画中的所有变形目标都应包含与基础几何图形名称相同的属性。

trans-unit.source: A MouseArea is an invisible item that is typically used in conjunction with a visible item in order to provide mouse handling for that item. By effectively acting as a proxy, the logic for mouse handling can be contained within a MouseArea item.
trans-unit.target: MouseArea是一个不可见的项目,通常与可见的项目一起使用,以便为该项目提供鼠标处理。通过有效的代理,鼠标处理的逻辑可以包含在MouseArea项目中。

trans-unit.source: A MouseDevice delegates mouse events from physical mouse device to MouseHandler objects. The sensitivity of the mouse can be controlled with the MouseDevice::sensitivity property, which specifies the rate in which the logical mouse coordinates change in response to physical movement of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: MouseDevice将鼠标事件从物理鼠标设备委派给MouseHandler对象。可以使用MouseDevice :: sensitiveivity属性控制鼠标的灵敏度，该属性指定逻辑鼠标坐标响应于鼠标的物理移动而变化的速率。

trans-unit.source: A Multi Viewport FrameGraph
trans-unit.target: 一个多视口FrameGraph

trans-unit.source: A MultiPointTouchArea is an invisible item that is used to track multiple touch points.
trans-unit.target: MultiPointTouchArea是一个不可见的项目,用于跟踪多个触摸点。

trans-unit.source: A MultiSampleAntiAliasing type enables multisample antialiasing.
trans-unit.target: MultiSampleAntiAliasing类型可以实现多采样抗锯齿。

trans-unit.source: A NoDepthMask type disables fragment depth write to depth buffer.
trans-unit.target: NoDepthMask类型禁用碎片深度写入深度缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: A Node does not have a url that other nodes can connect to, and thus is able to acquire replicas only. It is not able to share source objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个Node没有其他节点可以连接的URL,因此只能获取复制件。它不能共享源对象。

trans-unit.source: A NodeInstantiator can be used to control the dynamic creation of nodes, or to dynamically create multiple objects from a template.
trans-unit.target: NodeInstantiator可以用来控制节点的动态创建,或者从一个模板动态创建多个对象。

trans-unit.source: A Note About Accessing Attached Properties and Signal Handlers
trans-unit.target: 关于访问附加属性和信号处理程序的说明

trans-unit.source: A Note for X11 Users
trans-unit.target: X11用户须知

trans-unit.source: A Note on GUI Types
trans-unit.target: 关于GUI类型的说明

trans-unit.source: A Null value
trans-unit.target: 一个空值

trans-unit.source: A PDF 1.4 compatible document is produced.
trans-unit.target: 生成一个PDF 1.4兼容的文档。

trans-unit.source: A PDF 1.6 compatible document is produced. This value was added in Qt 5.12.
trans-unit.target: 一个PDF 1.6兼容的文档被生成。这个值是在Qt 5.12中添加的。

trans-unit.source: A PDF/A-1b compatible document is produced.
trans-unit.target: 产生一个PDF/A-1b兼容的文件。

trans-unit.source: A PDU is considered valid if the message code is in the range of 1 to 255 decimal and the PDU's compound size (function code + data) does not exceed 253 bytes. A default constructed PDU is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如果报文代码的范围在1到255十进制之间,并且PDU的复合大小(函数代码+数据)不超过253字节,则认为PDU有效。默认构造的 PDU 是无效的。

trans-unit.source: A Pan gesture.
trans-unit.target: 一个潘的手势。

trans-unit.source: A PaperSource defined by the printer that is unknown to Qt
trans-unit.target: 打印机定义的PaperSource,Qt不知道。

trans-unit.source: A Parameter can be referenced by a RenderPass, Technique, Effect, Material, TechniqueFilter, RenderPassFilter. At runtime, depending on which shader is selected for a given step of the rendering, the value contained in a Parameter will be converted and uploaded if the shader contains a uniform with a name matching that of the Parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过RenderPass，Technique，Effect，Material，TechniqueFilter，RenderPassFilter来引用参数。在运行时，根据着色器给定的渲染步骤选择了哪个着色器，如果着色器包含名称与该参数名称一致的制服，则将转换并上载包含在Parameter中的值。

trans-unit.source: A Parameter defined on a Material is overridden by a Parameter (of the same name) defined in a TechniqueFilter or a RenderPassFilter.
trans-unit.target: 在Material上定义的参数会被TechniqueFilter或RenderPassFilter中定义的参数（具有相同名称）覆盖。

trans-unit.source: A Parameter defined on an Effect is overridden by a QParameter (of the same name) defined in a Material, TechniqueFilter, RenderPassFilter.
trans-unit.target: 在效果上定义的参数被Material，TechniqueFilter，RenderPassFilter中定义的QParameter（同名）覆盖。

trans-unit.source: A ParentAnimation can contain any number of animations. These animations will be run in parallel; to run them sequentially, define them within a SequentialAnimation.
trans-unit.target: ParentAnimation可以包含任意数量的动画。这些动画将并行运行。要顺序运行它们，请在SequentialAnimation中定义它们。

trans-unit.source: A Path is composed of one or more path segments - PathLine, PathPolyline, PathQuad, PathCubic, PathArc, PathAngleArc, PathCurve, PathSvg.
trans-unit.target: 路径由一个或多个路径段组成-PathLine，PathPolyline，PathQuad，PathCubic，PathArc，PathAngleArc，PathCurve，PathSvg。

trans-unit.source: A Path is composed of one or more path segments - PathLine, PathQuad, PathCubic, PathArc, PathAngleArc, PathCurve, PathSvg.
trans-unit.target: 路径由一个或多个路径段组成-PathLine，PathQuad，PathCubic，PathArc，PathAngleArc，PathCurve，PathSvg。

trans-unit.source: A PathView displays data from models created from built-in QML types like ListModel and XmlListModel, or custom model classes defined in C++ that inherit from QAbstractListModel.
trans-unit.target: PathView显示从通过内置QML类型（例如ListModel和XmlListModel）创建的模型中的数据，或者从C ++定义的，自QAbstractListModel继承的自定义模型类中创建的数据。

trans-unit.source: A PathView displays data from models created from built-in QML types like ListModel and XmlListModel, or custom model classes defined in C++ that inherit from QAbstractListModel.
trans-unit.target: PathView显示从通过内置QML类型（例如ListModel和XmlListModel）创建的模型中的数据，或者从C ++定义的自QAbstractListModel继承的自定义模型类中创建的数据。

trans-unit.source: A Pinch gesture.
trans-unit.target: 一个捏的手势。

trans-unit.source: A PinchArea is an invisible item that is typically used in conjunction with a visible item in order to provide pinch gesture handling for that item.
trans-unit.target: PinchArea是一个不可见的项目,通常与可见的项目一起使用,以便为该项目提供捏合手势处理。

trans-unit.source: A Place is almost always tied to a plugin. The plugin property must be set before it is possible to call save(), remove() or getDetails(). The reviewModel, imageModel and editorialModel are only valid then the plugin property is set.
trans-unit.target: 位置几乎总是与插件绑定在一起。该插件属性必须设置之前，它是可以调用保存（） ，删除（）或getDetails（） 。该reviewModel，imageModel和editorialModel才有效，则插件属性设置。

trans-unit.source: A PointerEvent is an event describing contact or movement across a surface, provided by a mouse, a touchpoint (single finger on a touchscreen), or a stylus on a graphics tablet. The device property provides more information about where the event came from.
trans-unit.target: PointerEvent是描述由鼠标，触摸点（触摸屏上的单指）或图形输入板上的手写笔提供的在整个表面上接触或移动的事件。该设备属性提供有关该事件的来源的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: A PolygonOffset type adds an offset to the fragment depth value prior to depth test and depth write. The offset can be used to avoid z-fighting when rendering polygons with very close depth values such as decals.
trans-unit.target: PolygonOffset类型在深度测试和深度写入之前,为片段深度值添加一个偏移。当渲染具有非常接近深度值的多边形(如贴图)时,可以使用偏移量来避免Z打架。

trans-unit.source: A PropertyChanges object can also override the default signal handler for an object to implement a signal handler specific to the new state:
trans-unit.target: 一个PropertyChanges对象也可以覆盖对象的默认信号处理程序,以实现特定于新状态的信号处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A Puck (a device that is similar to a flat mouse with a transparent circle with cross-hairs).
trans-unit.target: A Puck(一种类似于平面鼠标的设备,有一个带十字线的透明圆圈)。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractItemDelegate provides the interface and common functionality for delegates in the model/view architecture. Delegates display individual items in views, and handle the editing of model data.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemDelegate为模型/视图架构中的代表提供了接口和通用功能。代表在视图中显示各个项目,并处理模型数据的编辑。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a Target1D target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有Target1D目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a Target1DArray target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有Target1DArray目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a Target2D target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有Target2D目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a Target2DArray target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有Target2DArray目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a Target2DMultisample target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有Target2DMultisample目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a Target2DMultisampleArray target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有Target2DMultisampleArray目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a Target3D target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有Target3D目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a TargetBuffer target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有TargetBuffer目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a TargetCubeMap target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有TargetCubeMap目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a TargetCubeMapArray target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有TargetCubeMapArray目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTexture with a TargetRectangle target format
trans-unit.target: 一个具有TargetRectangle目标格式的QAbstractTexture。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTextureImage that can be written through a QPainter
trans-unit.target: 一个可以通过QPainter编写的QAbstractTextureImage。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractXmlForwardIterator over QXmlItem.
trans-unit.target: 在QXmlItem上的QAbstractXmlForwardIterator 。

trans-unit.source: A QAction may contain an icon, menu text, a shortcut, status text, "What's This?" text, and a tooltip. Most of these can be set in the constructor. They can also be set independently with setIcon(), setText(), setIconText(), setShortcut(), setStatusTip(), setWhatsThis(), and setToolTip(). For menu items, it is possible to set an individual font with setFont().
trans-unit.target: QAction可能包含图标，菜单文本，快捷方式，状态文本“这是什么？” 文字和工具提示。其中大多数可以在构造函数中设置。它们还可以与独立设置的setIcon（）的setText（），setIconText（），setShortcut（），setStatusTip（），setWhatsThis（），和setToolTip（）。对于菜单项，可以使用setFont（）设置单个字体。

trans-unit.source: A QAction may contain an icon, menu text, a shortcut, status text, "What's This?" text, and a tooltip. Most of these can be set in the constructor. They can also be set independently with setIcon(), setText(), setIconText(), setShortcut(), setStatusTip(), setWhatsThis(), and setToolTip(). For menu items, it is possible to set an individual font with setFont().
trans-unit.target: QAction可能包含图标，菜单文本，快捷方式，状态文本“这是什么？” 文字和工具提示。其中大多数可以在构造函数中设置。它们还可以与独立设置的setIcon（）的setText（），setIconText（），setShortcut（），setStatusTip（），setWhatsThis（），和setToolTip（）。对于菜单项，可以使用setFont（）设置单个字体。

trans-unit.source: A QActionGroup emits an triggered() signal when one of its actions is chosen. Each action in an action group emits its triggered() signal as usual.
trans-unit.target: 甲QActionGroup发出触发时，其动作中的一个被选择（）信号。动作组中的每个动作照常发出其触发（）信号。

trans-unit.source: A QAnyStringView references a contiguous portion of a string it does not own. It acts as an interface type to all kinds of strings, without the need to construct a QString first.
trans-unit.target: QAnyStringView引用它不拥有的字符串的连续部分。它充当各种字符串的接口类型，而无需先构造QString。

trans-unit.source: A QAssociativeIterable::const_iterator can only be created by a QAssociativeIterable instance, and can be used in a way similar to other stl-style iterators.
trans-unit.target: QAssociativeIterable :: const_iterator只能由QAssociativeIterable实例创建，并且可以与其他stl样式迭代器类似的方式使用。

trans-unit.source: A QAssociativeIterable::iterator can only be created by a QAssociativeIterable instance, and can be used in a way similar to other stl-style iterators.
trans-unit.target: QAssociativeIterable :: iterator只能由QAssociativeIterable实例创建，并且可以与其他stl样式迭代器类似的方式使用。

trans-unit.source: A QAudioDeviceInfo is used by Qt to construct classes that communicate with the device--such as QAudioInput, and QAudioOutput.
trans-unit.target: Qt使用QAudioDeviceInfo构造与设备通信的类，例如QAudioInput和QAudioOutput。

trans-unit.source: A QAxObject can be instantiated as an empty object, with the name of the COM object it should wrap, or with a pointer to the IUnknown that represents an existing COM object. If the COM object implements the IDispatch interface, the properties, methods and events of that object become available as Qt properties, slots and signals. The base class, QAxBase, provides an API to access the COM object directly through the IUnknown pointer.
trans-unit.target: 一个QAxObject可以实例化为一个空对象，带有它应该包装的COM对象的名称，或者带有一个指向表示现有COM对象的IUnknown的指针。如果COM对象实现 IDispatch 接口，则该对象的属性，方法和事件将作为Qt属性，插槽和信号可用。QAxBase基类提供了一个API，可以直接通过IUnknown指针访问COM对象。

trans-unit.source: A QAxWidget can be instantiated as an empty object, with the name of the ActiveX control it should wrap, or with an existing interface pointer to the ActiveX control. The ActiveX control's properties, methods and events which only use QAxBase supported data types, become available as Qt properties, slots and signals. The base class QAxBase provides an API to access the ActiveX directly through the IUnknown pointer.
trans-unit.target: 可以将QAxWidget实例化为一个空对象，带有应包装的ActiveX控件的名称，或带有指向ActiveX控件的现有接口指针。仅使用QAxBase支持的数据类型的ActiveX控件的属性，方法和事件就可以作为Qt属性，插槽和信号使用。基类QAxBase提供了一个API，可以直接通过 IUnknown 指针访问ActiveX 。

trans-unit.source: A QBackingStore contains a buffered representation of the window contents, and thus supports partial updates by using QPainter to only update a sub region of the window contents.
trans-unit.target: QBackingStore包含窗口内容的缓冲表示，因此通过使用QPainter仅更新窗口内容的子区域来支持部分更新。

trans-unit.source: A QBitArray is an array that gives access to individual bits and provides operators (AND, OR, XOR, and NOT) that work on entire arrays of bits. It uses implicit sharing (copy-on-write) to reduce memory usage and to avoid the needless copying of data.
trans-unit.target: QBitArray是一个数组，它可以访问单个位并提供可在整个位数组上工作的运算符（AND，OR，XOR和NOT）。它使用隐式共享（写时复制）来减少内存使用并避免不必要的数据复制。

trans-unit.source: A QByteArray can embed '\0' bytes. The size() function always returns the size of the whole array, including embedded '\0' bytes, but excluding the terminating '\0' added by QByteArray. For example:
trans-unit.target: QByteArray可以嵌入“ \ 0”字节。的尺寸（）函数总是返回整个阵列的大小，包括嵌入式“\ 0”字节，但不包括由加入的QByteArray终止“\ 0”。例如：

trans-unit.source: A QByteArrayView references a contiguous portion of raw bytes it does not own. It acts as an interface type to all kinds of byte-array-like data, without the need to construct a QByteArray first.
trans-unit.target: QByteArrayView引用了它不拥有的原始字节的连续部分。它充当所有类似字节数组的数据的接口类型，而无需先构造QByteArray。

trans-unit.source: A QCalendar object maps a year, month, and day-number to a specific day (ultimately identified by its Julian day number), using the rules of a particular system.
trans-unit.target: QCalendar对象使用特定系统的规则,将年、月、日号映射到特定的日子(最终由其朱利安日号确定)。

trans-unit.source: A QCalendar value is immutable.
trans-unit.target: 一个QCalendar值是不可改变的。

trans-unit.source: A QCameraInfo can be used to construct a QCamera. The following example instantiates a QCamera whose camera device is named 'mycamera':
trans-unit.target: QCameraInfo可用于构造QCamera。以下示例实例化了一个QCamera，其相机设备名为“ mycamera”：

trans-unit.source: A QCheckBox is an option button that can be switched on (checked) or off (unchecked). Checkboxes are typically used to represent features in an application that can be enabled or disabled without affecting others. Different types of behavior can be implemented. For example, a QButtonGroup can be used to group check buttons logically, allowing exclusive checkboxes. However, QButtonGroup does not provide any visual representation.
trans-unit.target: QCheckBox是一个选项按钮，可以打开（选中）或关闭（取消选中）。复选框通常用于表示应用程序中可以启用或禁用而不会影响其他功能的功能。可以实现不同类型的行为。例如，QButtonGroup可以用于对检查按钮进行逻辑分组，从而允许排他性复选框。但是，QButtonGroup不提供任何视觉表示。

trans-unit.source: A QCollator object can be used together with template based sorting algorithms such as std::sort to sort a list of QStrings.
trans-unit.target: QCollator对象可以与基于模板的排序算法(如std::sort)一起使用,对QStrings列表进行排序。

trans-unit.source: A QComboBox provides a means of presenting a list of options to the user in a way that takes up the minimum amount of screen space.
trans-unit.target: QComboBox提供了一种以占用最少屏幕空间的方式向用户展示选项列表的方法。

trans-unit.source: A QCompleter is used typically with a QLineEdit or QComboBox. For example, here's how to provide auto completions from a simple word list in a QLineEdit:
trans-unit.target: QCompleter通常与QLineEdit或QComboBox一起使用。例如，以下是从QLineEdit中的简单单词列表提供自动补全的方法：

trans-unit.source: A QCompleter is used typically with a QLineEdit or QComboBox. For example, here's how to provide auto completions from a simple word list in a QLineEdit:
trans-unit.target: QCompleter通常与QLineEdit或QComboBox一起使用。例如，以下是从QLineEdit中的简单单词列表提供自动补全的方法：

trans-unit.source: A QDBusPendingCall object is a reference to a method call that was sent over D-Bus without waiting for a reply. QDBusPendingCall is an opaque type, meant to be used as a handle for a pending reply.
trans-unit.target: QDBusPendingCall对象是对通过D-Bus发送的方法调用的引用,而不需要等待回复。QDBusPendingCall是一个不透明的类型,用来作为一个待回复的句柄。

trans-unit.source: A QDBusReply object is a subset of the QDBusMessage object that represents a method call's reply. It contains only the first output argument or the error code and is used by QDBusInterface-derived classes to allow returning the error code as the function's return argument.
trans-unit.target: 甲QDBusReply对象是一个子集QDBusMessage表示方法调用的答复对象。它仅包含第一个输出参数或错误代码，并且QDBusInterface派生的类使用它来允许将错误代码作为函数的返回参数返回。

trans-unit.source: A QDBusReply object is a subset of the QDBusMessage object that represents a method call's reply. It contains only the first output argument or the error code and is used by QDBusInterface-derived classes to allow returning the error code as the function's return argument.
trans-unit.target: 甲QDBusReply对象是一个子集QDBusMessage表示方法调用的答复对象。它仅包含第一个输出参数或错误代码，并且QDBusInterface派生的类使用它来允许将错误代码作为函数的返回参数返回。

trans-unit.source: A QDBusServiceWatcher object can be used to notify the application about an ownership change of a service name on the bus. It has three watch modes:
trans-unit.target: QDBusServiceWatcher对象可以用来通知应用程序关于总线上服务名称的所有权变化。它有三种监视模式。

trans-unit.source: A QDate object is typically created by giving the year, month, and day numbers explicitly. Note that QDate interprets year numbers less than 100 as presented, i.e., as years 1 through 99, without adding any offset. The static function currentDate() creates a QDate object containing the date read from the system clock. An explicit date can also be set using setDate(). The fromString() function returns a QDate given a string and a date format which is used to interpret the date within the string.
trans-unit.target: 通常通过显式给出年，月和日编号来创建QDate对象。请注意，QDate解释的年份少于所显示的100，即从1到99年，而没有添加任何偏移量。静态函数currentDate（）创建一个QDate对象，该对象包含从系统时钟读取的日期。还可以使用setDate（）设置显式日期。所述fromString（）函数返回给定的一个字符串，并它是用来解释字符串内的日期的日期格式QDATE。

trans-unit.source: A QDate object represents a particular day, regardless of calendar, locale or other settings used when creating it or supplied by the system. It can report the year, month and day of the month that represent the day with respect to the proleptic Gregorian calendar or any calendar supplied as a QCalendar object.
trans-unit.target: QDate对象代表特定的一天，而与创建日期或系统提供的日历，语言环境或其他设置无关。它可以报告年，月和日，分别代表相对于公历或任何作为QCalendar对象提供的日历的日期。

trans-unit.source: A QDate object represents a particular day, regardless of calendar, locale or other settings used when creating it or supplied by the system. It can report the year, month and day of the month that represent the day with respect to the proleptic Gregorian calendar or any calendar supplied as a QCalendar object. QDate objects should be passed by value rather than by reference to const; they simply package qint64.
trans-unit.target: QDate对象代表特定的一天，而与创建日期或系统提供的日历，语言环境或其他设置无关。它可以报告年，月和日，分别代表相对于公历或任何作为QCalendar对象提供的日历的日期。QDate对象应该通过值传递，而不是通过引用const传递。他们只是打包 qint64 。

trans-unit.source: A QDateTime object encodes a calendar date and a clock time (a "datetime"). It combines features of the QDate and QTime classes. It can read the current datetime from the system clock. It provides functions for comparing datetimes and for manipulating a datetime by adding a number of seconds, days, months, or years.
trans-unit.target: QDateTime对象对日历日期和时钟时间（“ datetime”）进行编码。它结合了QDate和QTime类的功能。它可以从系统时钟读取当前日期时间。它提供了用于比较日期时间并通过添加秒数，天数，月数或年数来操纵日期时间的功能。

trans-unit.source: A QDateTime object is typically created either by giving a date and time explicitly in the constructor, or by using a static function such as currentDateTime() or fromMSecsSinceEpoch(). The date and time can be changed with setDate() and setTime(). A datetime can also be set using the setMSecsSinceEpoch() function that takes the time, in milliseconds, since 00:00:00 on January 1, 1970. The fromString() function returns a QDateTime, given a string and a date format used to interpret the date within the string.
trans-unit.target: 通常，通过在构造函数中显式给出日期和时间，或使用静态函数（例如currentDateTime（）或fromMSecsSinceEpoch（））来创建QDateTime对象。可以使用setDate（）和setTime（）更改日期和时间。日期时间，也可以使用设置setMSecsSinceEpoch（）函数，它的时间，以毫秒为单位1月1日，1970年，由于00:00:00 fromString（）函数返回一个给定QDateTime用于将字符串和日期格式，解释字符串中的日期。

trans-unit.source: A QDepthTest class is used to enable depth testing with a given depth test function. The depth test enables writing fragment color values when the depth test passes, and reject fragments which fail the test. The depth test uses the depth function to test the fragments depth value to the value against z-buffer. If the underlying surface does not have z-buffer, then QDepthTest does nothing.
trans-unit.target: QDepthTest类用来实现给定深度测试函数的深度测试。深度测试能够在深度测试通过时写入片段颜色值,并拒绝测试失败的片段。深度测试使用深度函数来测试碎片深度值与z-buffer的值。如果底层表面没有z-buffer,那么QDepthTest什么也不做。

trans-unit.source: A QDir can point to a file using either a relative or an absolute path. Absolute paths begin with the directory separator (optionally preceded by a drive specification under Windows). Relative file names begin with a directory name or a file name and specify a path relative to the current directory.
trans-unit.target: QDir可以使用相对路径或绝对路径指向一个文件。绝对路径以目录分隔符开始(在Windows下可选择在前面加上一个驱动器规格)。相对文件名以目录名或文件名开头,并指定一个相对于当前目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: A QDir is used to manipulate path names, access information regarding paths and files, and manipulate the underlying file system. It can also be used to access Qt's resource system.
trans-unit.target: QDir用于操纵路径名，访问有关路径和文件的信息以及操纵底层文件系统。它也可以用来访问Qt的资源系统。

trans-unit.source: A QDoc comment can contain multiple topic commands in the same category, with some restrictions. This way, it's possible to write a single comment that documents all overloads of a function (using multiple \fn commands), or all properties in a QML property group (using \qmlproperty commands) in one go.
trans-unit.target: 一个QDoc注释可以在同一类别中包含多个主题命令，但有一些限制。这样，就可以一次编写一个注释来记录一个函数的所有重载（使用多个\ fn命令）或QML属性组中的所有属性（使用\ qmlproperty命令）。

trans-unit.source: A QDockWidget acts as a wrapper for its child widget, set with setWidget(). Custom size hints, minimum and maximum sizes and size policies should be implemented in the child widget. QDockWidget will respect them, adjusting its own constraints to include the frame and title. Size constraints should not be set on the QDockWidget itself, because they change depending on whether it is docked; a docked QDockWidget has no frame and a smaller title bar.
trans-unit.target: QDockWidget充当其子窗口小部件的包装，该子窗口小部件由setWidget（）设置。自定义大小提示，最小和最大大小以及大小策略应在子窗口小部件中实现。QDockWidget将尊重它们，调整其自身的约束以包括框架和标题。不应在QDockWidget本身上设置大小限制，因为它们会根据是否停靠而改变；停靠的QDockWidget没有框架和较小的标题栏。

trans-unit.source: A QDockWidget consists of a title bar and the content area. The title bar displays the dock widgets window title, a
trans-unit.target: QDockWidget由标题栏和内容区域组成。标题栏显示停靠小部件窗口标题，

trans-unit.source: A QDomEntityReference object may be inserted into the DOM tree when an entity reference is in the source document, or when the user wishes to insert an entity reference.
trans-unit.target: 当一个实体引用在源文档中,或者当用户希望插入一个实体引用时,一个QDomEntityReference对象可以被插入到DOM树中。

trans-unit.source: A QDomNode can be converted into one of its subclasses using toAttr(), toCDATASection(), toDocumentFragment(), toDocument(), toDocumentType(), toElement(), toEntityReference(), toText(), toEntity(), toNotation(), toProcessingInstruction(), toCharacterData() or toComment(). You can convert a node to a null node with clear().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用toAttr（），toCDATASection（），toDocumentFragment（），toDocument（），toDocumentType（），toElement（），toEntityReference（），toText（），toEntity（），toNotation（）将QDomNode转换为其子类之一。，toProcessingInstruction（），toCharacterData（）或toComment（）。您可以使用clear（）将节点转换为空节点。

trans-unit.source: A QDomNode can be null, much like nullptr. Creating a copy of a null node results in another null node. It is not possible to modify a null node, but it is possible to assign another, possibly non-null node to it. In this case, the copy of the null node will remain null. You can check if a QDomNode is null by calling isNull(). The empty constructor of a QDomNode (or any of the derived classes) creates a null node.
trans-unit.target: QDomNode可以为null，就像 nullptr 一样。创建空节点的副本将导致另一个空节点。无法修改空节点，但可以为其分配另一个（可能是非空）节点。在这种情况下，空节点的副本将保持为空。您可以通过调用isNull（）检查QDomNode是否为null 。QDomNode（或任何派生类）的空构造函数创建一个空节点。

trans-unit.source: A QEventTransition object binds an event to a particular QObject. QEventTransition is part of The State Machine Framework.
trans-unit.target: QEventTransition对象将事件绑定到特定的QObject。QEventTransition是状态机框架的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A QFileInfo can point to a file with either a relative or an absolute file path. Absolute file paths begin with the directory separator "/" (or with a drive specification on Windows). Relative file names begin with a directory name or a file name and specify a path relative to the current working directory. An example of an absolute path is the string "/tmp/quartz". A relative path might look like "src/fatlib". You can use the function isRelative() to check whether a QFileInfo is using a relative or an absolute file path. You can call the function makeAbsolute() to convert a relative QFileInfo's path to an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: QFileInfo可以指向具有相对或绝对文件路径的文件。绝对文件路径以目录分隔符“ /”（或Windows上的驱动器规范）开头。相对文件名以目录名或文件名开头，并指定相对于当前工作目录的路径。绝对路径的一个示例是字符串“ / tmp / quartz”。相对路径可能类似于“ src / fatlib”。您可以使用函数isRelative（）来检查QFileInfo是使用相对还是绝对文件路径。您可以调用函数makeAbsolute（）将相对的QFileInfo的路径转换为绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: A QFrameGraphNode used to select QTechniques to use
trans-unit.target: 一个QFrameGraphNode,用于选择要使用的QTechniques。

trans-unit.source: A QFrustumCulling class enables frustum culling of the drawable entities based on the camera view and QGeometry bounds of the entities. If QFrustumCulling is present in the FrameGraph, only the entities whose QGeometry bounds intersect with the camera frustum, i.e. the view of the camera, are drawn. If QFrustumCulling is not present, all drawable entities will be drawn. The camera is selected by a QCameraSelector frame graph node in the current hierarchy. Frustum culling can save a lot of GPU processing time when the rendered scene is complex.
trans-unit.target: QFrustumCulling类可根据摄影机视图和实体的QGeometry边界启用对可绘制实体的视锥剔除。如果在FrameGraph中存在QFrustumCulling，则仅绘制其QGeometry边界与摄影机视锥相交的实体，即摄影机的视图。如果不存在QFrustumCulling，则将绘制所有可绘制实体。摄像机由当前层次结构中的QCameraSelector帧图节点选择。当渲染的场景很复杂时，平截头体剔除可以节省大量GPU处理时间。

trans-unit.source: A QFrustumCulling class enables frustum culling of the drawable entities based on the camera view and QGeometry bounds of the entities. If QFrustumCulling is present in the FrameGraph, only the entities whose QGeometry bounds intersect with the camera frustum, i.e. the view of the camera, are drawn. If QFrustumCulling is not present, all drawable entities will be drawn. The camera is selected by a QCameraSelector frame graph node in the current hierarchy. Frustum culling can save a lot of GPU processing time when the rendered scene is complex.
trans-unit.target: QFrustumCulling类可基于摄影机视图和实体的QGeometry边界启用可绘制实体的视锥剔除。如果在FrameGraph中存在QFrustumCulling，则仅绘制其QGeometry边界与摄影机视锥相交的实体，即摄影机的视图。如果不存在QFrustumCulling，则将绘制所有可绘制实体。摄像机由当前层次结构中的QCameraSelector帧图节点选择。当渲染的场景很复杂时，平截头体剔除可以节省大量GPU处理时间。

trans-unit.source: A QGeoAreaMonitorInfo object is valid if it has a non-empty name and a valid area(). Such objects must be registered with a QGeoAreaMonitorSource to start and stop the monitoring process. Note that extensive monitoring can be very resource consuming because the positioning engine must remain active and has to match the current position with each QGeoAreaMonitorInfo instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果QGeoAreaMonitorInfo对象具有非空名称和有效区域（），则该对象有效。必须向QGeoAreaMonitorSource注册此类对象才能启动和停止监视过程。请注意，由于定位引擎必须保持活动状态并且必须将当前位置与每个QGeoAreaMonitorInfo实例进行匹配，因此进行大量监视可能会占用大量资源。

trans-unit.source: A QGeoAreaMonitorSource emits signals when the current position is in range, or has moved out of range, of a specified area. Each area is specified by a QGeoAreaMonitorInfo object. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当当前位置在指定区域的范围内或超出范围时，QGeoAreaMonitorSource发出信号。每个区域均由QGeoAreaMonitorInfo对象指定。例如：

trans-unit.source: A QGeoCoordinate is defined by latitude, longitude, and optionally, altitude.
trans-unit.target: QGeoCoordinate由纬度、经度和可选的高度定义。

trans-unit.source: A QGeoLocation consists of a coordinate and corresponding address, along with an optional bounding box which is the recommended region to be displayed when viewing the location.
trans-unit.target: 一个QGeoLocation由一个坐标和对应的地址,以及一个可选的边界框组成,边界框是查看位置时要显示的推荐区域。

trans-unit.source: A QGeoPath is both invalid and empty if it contains no coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 一个QGeoPath如果不包含坐标,那么它既是无效的,也是空的。

trans-unit.source: A QGeoPositionInfo contains, at a minimum, a geographical coordinate and a timestamp. It may also have heading and speed measurements as well as estimates of the accuracy of the provided data.
trans-unit.target: QGeoPositionInfo至少包含一个地理坐标和一个时间戳。它还可能包含航向和速度测量值,以及对所提供数据准确性的估计。

trans-unit.source: A QGeoRoute object contains high level information about a route, such as the length the route, the estimated travel time for the route, and enough information to render a basic image of the route on a map.
trans-unit.target: QGeoRoute对象包含了路线的高层次信息,如路线的长度、路线的估计旅行时间,以及足够的信息来在地图上呈现路线的基本图像。

trans-unit.source: A QGeoRouteSegment instance has information about the physical layout of the route segment, the length of the route and estimated time required to traverse the route segment and an optional QGeoManeuver associated with the beginning of the route segment.
trans-unit.target: QGeoRouteSegment实例具有以下信息：路由段的物理布局，路由的长度和遍历路由段所需的估计时间，以及与路由段的开头关联的可选QGeoManeuver。

trans-unit.source: A QGesture instance is implicitly created when needed and is owned by Qt. Developers should never destroy them or store them for later use as Qt may destroy particular instances of them and create new ones to replace them.
trans-unit.target: QGesture实例是在需要时隐式创建的,由Qt拥有。开发者永远不要销毁它们或存储它们以供以后使用,因为Qt可能会销毁它们的特定实例并创建新的实例来替换它们。

trans-unit.source: A QGraphicsItemGroup is a special type of compound item that treats itself and all its children as one item (i.e., all events and geometries for all children are merged together). It's common to use item groups in presentation tools, when the user wants to group several smaller items into one big item in order to simplify moving and copying of items.
trans-unit.target: QGraphicsItemGroup是一种特殊类型的复合项,它将自己和所有子项视为一个项(即所有子项的所有事件和几何图形都合并在一起)。在演示工具中,当用户希望将几个较小的项目归为一个大项目,以简化项目的移动和复制时,通常会使用项目组。

trans-unit.source: A QHash allows only one value per key. If you call insert() with a key that already exists in the QHash, the previous value is erased. For example:
trans-unit.target: 一个QHash每个键只允许一个值。如果使用QHash中已存在的键调用insert（），则先前的值将被删除。例如：

trans-unit.source: A QHash's key type has additional requirements other than being an assignable data type: it must provide operator==(), and there must also be a qHash() function in the type's namespace that returns a hash value for an argument of the key's type.
trans-unit.target: QHash的键类型除了是可分配的数据类型外，还具有其他要求：它必须提供operator ==（），并且在该类型的名称空间中还必须有一个qHash（）函数，该函数返回键类型的参数的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: A QHeaderView displays the headers used in item views such as the QTableView and QTreeView classes. It takes the place of Qt3's QHeader class previously used for the same purpose, but uses the Qt's model/view architecture for consistency with the item view classes.
trans-unit.target: QHeaderView显示项目视图（例如QTableView和QTreeView类）中使用的标题。它代替了以前用于相同目的的Qt3的 QHeader 类，但是使用Qt的模型/视图体系结构来与项目视图类保持一致。

trans-unit.source: A QIcon can generate smaller, larger, active, and disabled pixmaps from the set of pixmaps it is given. Such pixmaps are used by Qt widgets to show an icon representing a particular action.
trans-unit.target: QIcon可以从给定的pixelmaps集合中生成较小的、较大的、活动的和禁用的pixelmaps。这些像素图被Qt widgets用来显示一个代表特定操作的图标。

trans-unit.source: A QItemSelection describes the items in a model that have been selected by the user. A QItemSelection is basically a list of selection ranges, see QItemSelectionRange. It provides functions for creating and manipulating selections, and selecting a range of items from a model.
trans-unit.target: QItemSelection描述了用户已选择的模型中的项目。QItemSelection基本上是选择范围的列表，请参见QItemSelectionRange。它提供了用于创建和操纵选择以及从模型中选择一系列项目的功能。

trans-unit.source: A QItemSelectionModel keeps track of the selected items in a view, or in several views onto the same model. It also keeps track of the currently selected item in a view.
trans-unit.target: QItemSelectionModel在一个视图中或在同一个模型上的多个视图中跟踪选定的项目。它还跟踪视图中的当前选择项。

trans-unit.source: A QItemSelectionRange contains information about a range of selected items in a model. A range of items is a contiguous array of model items, extending to cover a number of adjacent rows and columns with a common parent item; this can be visualized as a two-dimensional block of cells in a table. A selection range has a top(), left() a bottom(), right() and a parent().
trans-unit.target: QItemSelectionRange包含有关模型中选定项目范围的信息。项的范围是模型项的连续数组，并扩展为覆盖具有公共父项的多个相邻行和列；可以将其可视化为表格中单元格的二维块。选择范围具有顶部（），左侧（），底部（），右侧（）和父级（）。

trans-unit.source: A QIterator can only be created by a QIterable instance, and can be used in a way similar to other stl-style iterators. Generally, QIterator should not be used directly, but through its derived classes provided by QSequentialIterable and QAssociativeIterable.
trans-unit.target: QIterator只能由QIterable实例创建，并且可以以类似于其他stl样式迭代器的方式使用。通常，不应直接使用QIterator，而应通过QSequentialIterable和QAssociativeIterable提供的派生类使用它。

trans-unit.source: A QJsonArray can be converted to and from a QVariantList. You can query the number of entries with size(), insert(), and removeAt() entries from it and iterate over its content using the standard C++ iterator pattern.
trans-unit.target: QJsonArray可以与QVariantList相互转换。您可以从中查询具有size（），insert（）和removeAt（）条目的条目数，并使用标准C ++迭代器模式对其内容进行迭代。

trans-unit.source: A QJsonObject can be converted to and from a QVariantMap. You can query the number of (key, value) pairs with size(), insert(), and remove() entries from it and iterate over its content using the standard C++ iterator pattern.
trans-unit.target: QJsonObject可以与QVariantMap相互转换。您可以使用大小（）查询（键，值）对的数量，从中插入（），从（）中删除（）条目，并使用标准C ++迭代器模式遍历其内容。

trans-unit.source: A QLabel can contain any of the following content types:
trans-unit.target: 一个QLabel可以包含以下任何一种内容类型。

trans-unit.source: A QLabel is often used as a label for an interactive widget. For this use QLabel provides a useful mechanism for adding an mnemonic (see QKeySequence) that will set the keyboard focus to the other widget (called the QLabel's "buddy"). For example:
trans-unit.target: QLabel通常用作交互式窗口小部件的标签。对于此用途，QLabel提供了一种有用的机制来添加助记符（请参阅QKeySequence），该助记符会将键盘焦点设置到其他小部件（称为QLabel的“伙伴”）。例如：

trans-unit.source: A QLayer can be applied to a subtree of entities by setting the recursive property to true.
trans-unit.target: 通过将递归属性设置为true,QLayer可以应用于实体的子树。

trans-unit.source: A QLine describes a finite length line (or a line segment) on a two-dimensional surface. The start and end points of the line are specified using integer point accuracy for coordinates. Use the QLineF constructor to retrieve a floating point copy.
trans-unit.target: QLine描述二维表面上的有限长度的线（或线段）。直线的起点和终点使用整数点精度指定坐标。使用QLineF构造函数检索浮点副本。

trans-unit.source: A QLineF describes a finite length line (or line segment) on a two-dimensional surface. QLineF defines the start and end points of the line using floating point accuracy for coordinates. Use the toLine() function to retrieve an integer based copy of this line.
trans-unit.target: QLineF在二维表面上描述了有限长度的线（或线段）。QLineF使用浮点精度来定义坐标线的起点和终点。使用toLine（）函数可检索此行的基于整数的副本。

trans-unit.source: A QListView presents items stored in a model, either as a simple non-hierarchical list, or as a collection of icons. This class is used to provide lists and icon views that were previously provided by the QListBox and QIconView classes, but using the more flexible approach provided by Qt's model/view architecture.
trans-unit.target: QListView以简单的非分层列表或图标集合的形式显示存储在模型中的项目。该类用于提供以前由 QListBox 和 QIconView 类提供的列表和图标视图，但使用Qt的模型/视图体系结构提供的更灵活的方法。

trans-unit.source: A QListWidgetItem represents a single item in a QListWidget. Each item can hold several pieces of information, and will display them appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 一个QListWidgetItem代表在单个项目QListWidget。每个项目可以容纳几条信息，并将适当地显示它们。

trans-unit.source: A QML API to display and manipulate client content, fully integrated with all the features in Qt Quick.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于显示和操作客户端内容的QML API,完全集成了Qt Quick的所有功能。

trans-unit.source: A QML RSS news reader that uses XmlListModel and XmlRole to download XML data, ListModel and ListElement to create a category list, and ListView to display the data
trans-unit.target: 一个QML RSS新闻阅读器,它使用XmlListModel和XmlRole来下载XML数据,使用ListModel和ListElement来创建分类列表,使用ListView来显示数据。

trans-unit.source: A QML app designed for portrait devices that uses custom components, animated with AnimationController, and JavaScript for the application logic
trans-unit.target: 一个为人像设备设计的QML应用程序,它使用自定义组件,使用AnimationController进行动画,并使用JavaScript进行应用逻辑。

trans-unit.source: A QML app for touch devices that uses a Repeater with a FolderListModel to access content in a folder, and a PinchArea that contains a MouseArea to handle pinch gestures on the fetched content
trans-unit.target: 一个适用于触摸设备的QML应用程序,它使用一个带有文件夹列表模型的Repeater来访问文件夹中的内容,以及一个包含MouseArea的PinchArea来处理获取的内容上的捏合手势。

trans-unit.source: A QML clock application that demonstrates using a ListView type to display data generated by a ListModel and a SpringAnimation type to animate images
trans-unit.target: 一个QML时钟应用程序,它演示了使用ListView类型来显示由ListModel生成的数据,以及使用SpringAnimation类型来制作图像动画。

trans-unit.source: A QML document can be loaded with QQmlComponent or QQuickView. QQmlComponent loads a QML document as a C++ object that can then be modified from C++ code. QQuickView also does this, but as QQuickView is a QWindow-derived class, the loaded object will also be rendered into a visual display; QQuickView is generally used to integrate a displayable QML object into an application's user interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用QQmlComponent或QQuickView加载QML文档。QQmlComponent将QML文档作为C ++对象加载，然后可以从C ++代码进行修改。QQuickView也可以做到这一点，但是由于QQuickView是QWindow派生的类，因此加载的对象也将呈现为可视显示。QQuickView通常用于将可显示的QML对象集成到应用程序的用户界面中。

trans-unit.source: A QML document defines a hierarchy of objects with a highly-readable, structured layout. Every QML document consists of two parts: an imports section and an object declaration section. The types and functionality most common to user interfaces are provided in the QtQuick import.
trans-unit.target: QML文档使用高度可读的结构化布局定义了对象的层次结构。每个QML文档都由两部分组成：导入部分和对象声明部分。 QtQuick 导入中提供了用户界面最常用的类型和功能。

trans-unit.source: A QML document describes a hierarchy of objects which can be instantiated. Each object definition has a certain structure; it has a type, it can have an id and an object name, it can have properties, it can have methods, it can have signals and it can have signal handlers.
trans-unit.target: 一个QML文档描述了一个可以实例化的对象的层次结构,它可以有类型,可以有id和对象名,可以有属性,可以有方法,可以有信号,可以有信号处理程序。每个对象定义都有一定的结构,它有类型,可以有id和对象名,可以有属性,可以有方法,可以有信号,可以有信号处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A QML document is a self contained piece of QML source code that consists of two parts:
trans-unit.target: 一个QML文档是一个自带的QML源代码,由两部分组成。

trans-unit.source: A QML document may have one or more imports at the top of the file. An import can be any one of:
trans-unit.target: 一个QML文档可以在文件的顶部有一个或多个导入。一个导入可以是以下任何一种:

trans-unit.source: A QML document may import a JavaScript resource with the following syntax:
trans-unit.target: 一个QML文档可以用以下语法导入一个JavaScript资源。

trans-unit.source: A QML engine uses QNetworkAccessManager for all network access. By implementing a factory, it is possible to provide the QML engine with custom QNetworkAccessManager instances with specialized caching, proxy and cookies support.
trans-unit.target: QML引擎使用QNetworkAccessManager进行所有的网络访问。通过实现一个工厂,可以为QML引擎提供定制的QNetworkAccessManager实例,并支持专门的缓存、代理和cookies。

trans-unit.source: A QML file must only contain a single root object definition. The following is invalid and will generate an error:
trans-unit.target: QML文件只能包含一个根对象定义。以下内容无效，并会产生错误：

trans-unit.source: A QML implementation of the popular puzzle game by Kuniaki Moribe
trans-unit.target: 森部邦明的人气益智游戏的QML实现。

trans-unit.source: A QML object emits the Component.completedattached signal when its instantiation is complete. The JavaScript code in the corresponding Component.onCompleted handler runs after the object is instantiated. Thus, the best place to write application startup code is in the Component.onCompleted handler of the top-level object, because this object emits Component.completed when the QML environment is fully established.
trans-unit.target: 当其实例化完成时，QML对象将发出 Component.completed 附加信号。实例化对象后，相应 Component.onCompleted 处理程序中的JavaScript代码将运行。因此，编写应用程序启动代码的最佳位置是顶级对象的 Component.onCompleted 处理程序，因为当完全建立QML环境时，此对象将发出 Component.completed 。

trans-unit.source: A QML object is an instance of a QML Object Type.
trans-unit.target: QML对象是QML对象类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: A QML object is an instance of a QML Object Type.
trans-unit.target: QML对象是QML对象类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: A QML object is an instance of a QML Object Type.
trans-unit.target: QML对象是QML对象类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: A QML object may have different easing curve for each property animation. There are also different parameters to control the curve, some of which are exclusive to a particular curve. For more information about the easing curves, visit the easing documentation.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个属性动画，QML对象可能具有不同的缓动曲线。还有一些不同的参数可控制曲线，其中某些参数是特定曲线所独有的。有关缓动曲线的更多信息，请访问缓动文档。

trans-unit.source: A QML object type in a signal parameter is translated to a pointer to the class in C++:
trans-unit.target: 信号参数中的QML对象类型在C++中被翻译成指向类的指针。

trans-unit.source: A QML object type is a type from which a QML object can be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: QML对象类型是一种可以实例化QML对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: A QML photo viewer that that uses XmlListModel and XmlRole to download Flickr feeds, and Package to display the photos in different views
trans-unit.target: 一个使用XmlListModel和XmlRole下载Flickr feeds的QML照片查看器,并使用Package以不同的视图显示照片。

trans-unit.source: A QML photo viewer that uses XmlListModel and XmlListModelRole custom QML types to download Flickr feeds, and Package to display the photos in different views
trans-unit.target: 一个使用XmlListModel和XmlListModelRole自定义QML类型来下载Flickr feeds的QML照片查看器,并使用Package来在不同的视图中显示照片。

trans-unit.source: A QML representation of a QEventPoint.
trans-unit.target: QEventPoint的QML表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A QML representation of a QQuickEventPoint.
trans-unit.target: QQuickEventPoint的QML表示。

trans-unit.source: A QML type belongs to a
trans-unit.target: 一个QML类型属于一个

trans-unit.source: A QML type can be defined either by a document in a .qml file beginning with a capital letter, or by a QObject-based C++ class.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过以大写字母开头的.qml文件中的文档或基于QObject的C ++类来定义QML类型。

trans-unit.source: A QML type implementation may choose to create an attaching type in C++ with particular properties and signals. Instances of this type can then be created and
trans-unit.target: QML类型实现可以选择在C ++中创建具有特定属性和信号的附加类型。然后可以创建这种类型的实例并

trans-unit.source: A QMatrix object can be built using the setMatrix(), scale(), rotate(), translate() and shear() functions. Alternatively, it can be built by applying basic matrix operations. The matrix can also be defined when constructed, and it can be reset to the identity matrix (the default) using the reset() function.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setMatrix（），scale（），rotate（），translate（）和剪切（）函数来构建QMatrix对象。或者，可以通过应用基本矩阵运算来构建它。也可以在构造矩阵时对其进行定义，并可以使用reset（）函数将其重置为恒等矩阵（默认值）。

trans-unit.source: A QMatrix object contains a 3 x 3 matrix. The dx and dy elements specify horizontal and vertical translation. The m11 and m22 elements specify horizontal and vertical scaling. And finally, the m21 and m12 elements specify horizontal and vertical
trans-unit.target: 一个QMatrix对象包含一个3 x 3的矩阵。在 dx 和 dy 元素指定水平和垂直平移。的 m11 和 m22 元素指定水平和垂直缩放。最后， m21 和 m12 元素指定水平和垂直

trans-unit.source: A QMenu can also provide a tear-off menu. A tear-off menu is a top-level window that contains a copy of the menu. This makes it possible for the user to "tear off" frequently used menus and position them in a convenient place on the screen. If you want this functionality for a particular menu, insert a tear-off handle with setTearOffEnabled(). When using tear-off menus, bear in mind that the concept isn't typically used on Microsoft Windows so some users may not be familiar with it. Consider using a QToolBar instead.
trans-unit.target: QMenu还可以提供一个分离式菜单。撕下菜单是包含该菜单副本的顶层窗口。这使用户可以“撕下”常用的菜单，并将它们放置在屏幕上的方便位置。如果要为特定菜单使用此功能，请使用setTearOffEnabled（）插入一个可撕下手柄。使用删除菜单时，请记住，该概念通常不在Microsoft Windows上使用，因此某些用户可能并不熟悉。考虑改用QToolBar。

trans-unit.source: A QMetaMethod has a methodType(), a methodSignature(), a list of parameterTypes() and parameterNames(), a return typeName(), a tag(), and an access() specifier. You can use invoke() to invoke the method on an arbitrary QObject.
trans-unit.target: QMetaMethod具有methodType（），methodSignature（），parameterTypes（）和parameterNames（）的列表，返回typeName（），标记（）和access（）说明符。您可以使用invoke（）在任意QObject上调用方法。

trans-unit.source: A QModelRoleData object is typically created by views or delegates, setting which role they want to fetch the data for. The object is then passed to models (see QAbstractItemModel::multiData()), which populate the data corresponding to the role stored. Finally, the view visualizes the data retrieved from the model.
trans-unit.target: QModelRoleData对象通常由视图或委托创建，设置它们要为其获取数据的角色。然后将该对象传递给模型（请参阅QAbstractItemModel :: multiData（）），该模型将填充与所存储角色相对应的数据。最后，该视图将从模型中检索的数据可视化。

trans-unit.source: A QModelRoleDataSpan is used as an abstraction over an array of QModelRoleData objects.
trans-unit.target: QModelRoleDataSpan用作对QModelRoleData对象数组的抽象。

trans-unit.source: A QMouseDevice delegates mouse events from physical mouse device to QMouseHandler objects. The sensitivity of the mouse can be controlled with the QMouseDevice::sensitivity property, which specifies the rate in which the logical mouse coordinates change in response to physical movement of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: QMouseDevice将鼠标事件从物理鼠标设备委派给QMouseHandler对象。可以使用QMouseDevice :: sensitiveivity属性控制鼠标的灵敏度，该属性指定逻辑鼠标坐标响应于鼠标的物理移动而变化的速率。

trans-unit.source: A QMultiMap allows multiple values per key. If you call insert() with a key that already exists in the map, a new (key, value) pair will be inserted. For example:
trans-unit.target: 一个QMultiMap允许每个键有多个值。如果使用映射中已存在的键调用insert（），将插入一个新的（键，值）对。例如：

trans-unit.source: A QNX Neutrino RTOS target used for development with Qt Creator should provide a few additional command line tools and services.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Qt Creator 开发的 QNX Neutrino 实时操作系统目标应提供一些额外的命令行工具和服务。

trans-unit.source: A QNdefMessage is a collection of 0 or more QNdefRecords. QNdefMessage inherits from QList<QNdefRecord> and therefore the standard QList functions can be used to manipulate the NDEF records in the message.
trans-unit.target: QNdefMessage是0或多个QNdefRecords的集合。QNdefMessage继承自QList < QNdefRecord >，因此可以使用标准QList函数来处理消息中的NDEF记录。

trans-unit.source: A QNetworkSession enables control over the system's network interfaces. The session's configuration parameter are determined via the QNetworkConfiguration object to which it is bound. Depending on the type of the session (single access point or service network) a session may be linked to one or more network interfaces. By means of opening and closing of network sessions a developer can start and stop the systems network interfaces. If the configuration represents multiple access points (see QNetworkConfiguration::ServiceNetwork) more advanced features such as roaming may be supported.
trans-unit.target: 通过QNetworkSession可以控制系统的网络接口。会话的配置参数通过绑定到的QNetworkConfiguration对象确定。根据会话的类型（单个接入点或服务网络），会话可以链接到一个或多个网络接口。通过打开和关闭网络会话，开发人员可以启动和停止系统的网络接口。如果配置代表多个访问点（请参阅QNetworkConfiguration :: ServiceNetwork），则可能支持更多高级功能，例如漫游。

trans-unit.source: A QNmeaPositionInfoSource instance operates in either RealTimeMode or SimulationMode. These modes allow NMEA data to be read from either a live source of positional data, or replayed for simulation purposes from previously recorded NMEA data.
trans-unit.target: QNmeaPositionInfoSource实例在RealTimeMode或SimulationMode中运行。这些模式允许从实时位置数据源中读取NMEA数据，或者从以前记录的NMEA数据中出于仿真目的重播NMEA数据。

trans-unit.source: A QObject instance is said to have a
trans-unit.target: 一个QObject实例被称为有一个

trans-unit.source: A QObjectCleanupHandler is useful whenever you need to know when a number of QObjects that are owned by someone else have been deleted. This is important, for example, when referencing memory in an application that has been allocated in a shared library.
trans-unit.target: 每当您需要知道何时删除了其他人拥有的多个QObject时，QObjectCleanupHandler就会很有用。例如，当在共享库中分配的应用程序中引用内存时，这一点很重要。

trans-unit.source: A QPageSize instance may also be obtained by querying the supported page sizes for a print device. In this case the localized name returned is that defined by the printer itself. Note that the print device may not support the current default locale language.
trans-unit.target: 也可以通过查询打印设备的支持页面大小来获得QPageSize实例。在这种情况下,返回的本地化名称是由打印机本身定义的。请注意,打印设备可能不支持当前的默认locale语言。

trans-unit.source: A QPaintedTextureImage must be subclassed and the virtual paint() function implemented. Each time update() is called on the QPaintedTextureImage, the paint() function is invoked and the resulting image is uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 必须对QPaintedTextureImage进行子类化，并实现virtual paint（）函数。每次在QPaintedTextureImage上调用update（）时，都会调用paint（）函数，并上传结果图像。

trans-unit.source: A QPaintedTextureImage provides a way to specify a texture image (and thus an OpenGL texture) through a QPainter. The width and height of the texture image can be specified through the width and height or size properties.
trans-unit.target: QPaintedTextureImage提供了一种通过QPainter指定纹理图像（从而指定OpenGL纹理）的方法。可以通过width和height或size属性指定纹理图像的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: A QPainterPath object can be constructed as an empty path, with a given start point, or as a copy of another QPainterPath object. Once created, lines and curves can be added to the path using the lineTo(), arcTo(), cubicTo() and quadTo() functions. The lines and curves stretch from the currentPosition() to the position passed as argument.
trans-unit.target: QPainterPath对象可以构造为具有给定起点的空路径，也可以构造为另一个QPainterPath对象的副本。创建之后，可以使用lineTo（），arcTo（），cubicTo（）和quadTo（）函数将直线和曲线添加到路径。直线和曲线从currentPosition（）延伸到作为参数传递的位置。

trans-unit.source: A QPainterPath object can be used for filling, outlining, and clipping. To generate fillable outlines for a given painter path, use the QPainterPathStroker class. The main advantage of painter paths over normal drawing operations is that complex shapes only need to be created once; then they can be drawn many times using only calls to the QPainter::drawPath() function.
trans-unit.target: QPainterPath对象可用于填充，概述和裁剪。要为给定的绘制路径生成可填充的轮廓，请使用QPainterPathStroker类。与常规绘图操作相比，画家路径的主要优势在于，复杂的形状只需要创建一次即可。那么仅使用对QPainter :: drawPath（）函数的调用就可以绘制它们多次。

trans-unit.source: A QParameter can be referenced by a QRenderPass, QTechnique, QEffect, QMaterial, QTechniqueFilter, QRenderPassFilter. At runtime, depending on which shader is selected for a given step of the rendering, the value contained in a QParameter will be converted and uploaded if the shader contains a uniform with a name matching that of the QParameter.
trans-unit.target: QParameter可以由QRenderPass，QTechnique，QEffect，QMaterial，QTechniqueFilter，QRenderPassFilter引用。在运行时，根据着色器给定步骤选择的着色器，如果着色器包含名称与QParameter匹配的统一名称，则将转换并上载QParameter中包含的值。

trans-unit.source: A QPartialOrdering value which represents an unordered result will always return false when compared against literal 0.
trans-unit.target: 一个代表无序结果的QPartialOrdering值在与字面值0比较时,总是返回false。

trans-unit.source: A QPersistentModelIndex is a model index that can be stored by an application, and later used to access information in a model. Unlike the QModelIndex class, it is safe to store a QPersistentModelIndex since the model will ensure that references to items will continue to be valid as long as they can be accessed by the model.
trans-unit.target: QPersistentModelIndex是一个模型索引，可以由应用程序存储，以后可以用来访问模型中的信息。与QModelIndex类不同，存储QPersistentModelIndex是安全的，因为模型将确保对项目的引用在模型可以访问的前提下继续有效。

trans-unit.source: A QPixmap can easily be displayed on the screen using QLabel or one of QAbstractButton's subclasses (such as QPushButton and QToolButton). QLabel has a pixmap property, whereas QAbstractButton has an icon property.
trans-unit.target: 使用QLabel或QAbstractButton的子类之一（例如QPushButton和QToolButton），可以轻松地在屏幕上显示QPixmap 。QLabel具有pixmap属性，而QAbstractButton具有icon属性。

trans-unit.source: A QPixmap can easily be displayed on the screen using QLabel or one of QAbstractButton's subclasses (such as QPushButton and QToolButton). QLabel has a pixmap property, whereas QAbstractButton has an icon property.
trans-unit.target: 使用QLabel或QAbstractButton的子类之一（例如QPushButton和QToolButton），可以轻松地在屏幕上显示QPixmap 。QLabel具有pixmap属性，而QAbstractButton具有icon属性。

trans-unit.source: A QPixmap object can be converted into a QImage using the toImage() function. Likewise, a QImage can be converted into a QPixmap using the fromImage(). If this is too expensive an operation, you can use QBitmap::fromImage() instead.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用toImage（）函数将QPixmap对象转换为QImage。同样，可以使用fromImage（）将QImage转换为QPixmap 。如果此操作过于昂贵，则可以改用QBitmap :: fromImage（）。

trans-unit.source: A QPlaceAttribute instance stores an additional piece of information about a place that is not otherwise exposed through the QPlace class. A QPlaceAttribute encapsulates a localized label which describes the attribute and rich text string representing the attribute's value. Generally, both are intended to be displayed to the end-user as is.
trans-unit.target: QPlaceAttribute实例存储有关该地点的其他信息，否则该信息不会通过QPlace类公开。QPlaceAttribute封装了描述该属性的本地化标签和表示该属性值的富文本字符串。通常，两者都打算按原样显示给最终用户。

trans-unit.source: A QPlainTextDocumentLayout is required for text documents that can be display or edited in a QPlainTextEdit. See QTextDocument::setDocumentLayout().
trans-unit.target: 可以在QPlainTextEdit中显示或编辑的文本文档需要QPlainTextDocumentLayout。参见QTextDocument :: setDocumentLayout（）。

trans-unit.source: A QPoint object can also be used as a vector: Addition and subtraction are defined as for vectors (each component is added separately). A QPoint object can also be divided or multiplied by an int or a qreal.
trans-unit.target: QPoint对象也可以用作向量：加法和减法的定义与向量相同（每个组件分别添加）。QPoint对象也可以除以 int 或 qreal 或相乘。

trans-unit.source: A QPointF object can also be used as a vector: Addition and subtraction are defined as for vectors (each component is added separately). A QPointF object can also be divided or multiplied by an int or a qreal.
trans-unit.target: QPointF对象也可以用作向量：加法和减法定义为向量（每个分量分别添加）。QPointF对象也可以与 int 或 qreal 相除或相乘。

trans-unit.source: A QPolygon object is a QList<QPoint>. The easiest way to add points to a QPolygon is to use QList's streaming operator, as illustrated below:
trans-unit.target: QPolygon对象是QList < QPoint >。将点添加到QPolygon的最简单方法是使用QList的流运算符，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A QPolygon object is a QVector<QPoint>. The easiest way to add points to a QPolygon is to use QVector's streaming operator, as illustrated below:
trans-unit.target: QPolygon对象是QVector < QPoint >。将点添加到QPolygon的最简单方法是使用QVector的流运算符，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A QPolygonF is a QList<QPointF>. The easiest way to add points to a QPolygonF is to use its streaming operator, as illustrated below:
trans-unit.target: QPolygonF是QList < QPointF >。将点添加到QPolygonF的最简单方法是使用其流运算符，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A QPolygonF is a QVector<QPointF>. The easiest way to add points to a QPolygonF is to use its streaming operator, as illustrated below:
trans-unit.target: QPolygonF是QVector < QPointF >。将点添加到QPolygonF的最简单方法是使用其流运算符，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A QPolygonOffset class adds an offset to the fragment depth value prior to depth test and depth write. The offset can be used to avoid z-fighting when rendering polygons with very close depth values such as decals.
trans-unit.target: QPolygonOffset类在深度测试和深度写入之前为片段深度值添加一个偏移。当渲染具有非常接近深度值的多边形(如贴图)时,可以使用该偏移量来避免Z打架。

trans-unit.source: A QProxyStyle wraps a QStyle (usually the default system style) for the purpose of dynamically overriding painting or other specific style behavior.
trans-unit.target: QProxyStyle包装QStyle（通常是默认的系统样式），以动态覆盖绘画或其他特定样式行为。

trans-unit.source: A QQmlComponent instance can be created from a QML file. For example, if there is a main.qml file like this:
trans-unit.target: 可以从QML文件创建QQmlComponent实例。例如，如果有一个 main.qml 文件，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A QQmlIncubationController derived instance should be created and set on a QQmlEngine by calling the QQmlEngine::setIncubationController() method. Processing is then controlled by calling the QQmlIncubationController::incubateFor() or QQmlIncubationController::incubateWhile() methods as dictated by the application's requirements.
trans-unit.target: 甲QQmlIncubationController派生的实例应被创建并在设置QQmlEngine通过调用QQmlEngine :: setIncubationController（）方法。然后，根据应用程序的要求，通过调用QQmlIncubationController :: incubateFor（）或QQmlIncubationController :: incubateWhile（）方法来控制处理。

trans-unit.source: A QQmlIncubationController derived instance should be created and set on a QQmlEngine by calling the QQmlEngine::setIncubationController() method. Processing is then controlled by calling the QQmlIncubationController::incubateFor() or QQmlIncubationController::incubateWhile() methods as dictated by the application's requirements.
trans-unit.target: 甲QQmlIncubationController派生的实例应被创建并在设置QQmlEngine通过调用QQmlEngine :: setIncubationController（）方法。然后，根据应用程序的要求，通过调用QQmlIncubationController :: incubateFor（）或QQmlIncubationController :: incubateWhile（）方法来控制处理。

trans-unit.source: A QQuickWindow always has a single invisible root item. To add items to this window, reparent the items to the root item or to an existing item in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 一个QQuickWindow总是有一个看不见的根项。要在这个窗口中添加项目,请将项目与根项目或场景中的现有项目重新组合。

trans-unit.source: A QQuickWindow is not necessarily backed by a native window on screen. The rendering can be redirected to target a custom render target, such as a given native texture. This is achieved in combination with the QQuickRenderControl class, and functions such as setRenderTarget(), setGraphicsDevice(), and setGraphicsConfiguration().
trans-unit.target: 屏幕上的本机窗口不一定支持QQuickWindow。可以将渲染重定向到目标自定义渲染目标，例如给定的本机纹理。结合QQuickRenderControl类和诸如setRenderTarget（），setGraphicsDevice（）和setGraphicsConfiguration（）之类的功能可以实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: A QRadioButton is an option button that can be switched on (checked) or off (unchecked). Radio buttons typically present the user with a "one of many" choice. In a group of radio buttons, only one radio button at a time can be checked; if the user selects another button, the previously selected button is switched off.
trans-unit.target: QRadioButton是一个可以打开(选中)或关闭(不选中)的选项按钮。单选按钮通常向用户呈现 "多选一 "的选择。在一组单选按钮中,一次只能选中一个单选按钮;如果用户选择了另一个按钮,则之前选中的按钮将被关闭。

trans-unit.source: A QRawFont object represents a single, physical instance of a given font in a given pixel size. I.e. in the typical case it represents a set of TrueType or OpenType font tables and uses a user specified pixel size to convert metrics into logical pixel units. It can be used in combination with the QGlyphRun class to draw specific glyph indexes at specific positions, and also have accessors to some relevant data in the physical font.
trans-unit.target: QRawFont对象以给定的像素大小表示给定字体的单个物理实例。即，在典型情况下，它表示一组TrueType或OpenType字体表，并使用用户指定的像素大小将指标转换为逻辑像素单位。它可以与QGlyphRun类结合使用，以在特定位置绘制特定的字形索引，并且还可以访问物理字体中的某些相关数据。

trans-unit.source: A QRawFont object represents a single, physical instance of a given font in a given pixel size. I.e. in the typical case it represents a set of TrueType or OpenType font tables and uses a user specified pixel size to convert metrics into logical pixel units. It can be used in combination with the QGlyphRun class to draw specific glyph indexes at specific positions, and also have accessors to some relevant data in the physical font.
trans-unit.target: QRawFont对象以给定的像素大小表示给定字体的单个物理实例。即，在典型情况下，它表示一组TrueType或OpenType字体表，并使用用户指定的像素大小将指标转换为逻辑像素单位。它可以与QGlyphRun类结合使用，以在特定位置绘制特定的字形索引，并且还可以访问物理字体中的某些相关数据。

trans-unit.source: A QRect can be constructed with a set of left, top, width and height integers, or from a QPoint and a QSize. The following code creates two identical rectangles.
trans-unit.target: QRect可以使用一组left，top，width和height整数或从QPoint和QSize构造。以下代码创建两个相同的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A QRectF can be constructed with a set of left, top, width and height coordinates, or from a QPointF and a QSizeF. The following code creates two identical rectangles.
trans-unit.target: QRectF可以使用一组左，上，宽和高坐标来构造，也可以根据QPointF和QSizeF来构造。以下代码创建两个相同的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A QRegularExpressionMatch object can be obtained by calling the QRegularExpression::match() function, or as a single result of a global match from a QRegularExpressionMatchIterator.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用QRegularExpression :: match（）函数或从QRegularExpressionMatchIterator进行全局匹配的单个结果来获取QRegularExpressionMatch对象。

trans-unit.source: A QRegularExpressionMatchIterator object is a forward only Java-like iterator; it can be obtained by calling the QRegularExpression::globalMatch() function. A new QRegularExpressionMatchIterator will be positioned before the first result. You can then call the hasNext() function to check if there are more results available; if so, the next() function will return the next result and advance the iterator.
trans-unit.target: QRegularExpressionMatchIterator对象是仅向前的类Java迭代器；可以通过调用QRegularExpression :: globalMatch（）函数获得它。新的QRegularExpressionMatchIterator将放置在第一个结果之前。然后，您可以调用hasNext（）函数来检查是否还有更多结果可用；如果是这样，则next（）函数将返回下一个结果并推进迭代器。

trans-unit.source: A QRemoteObjectNode does not have a url that other nodes can connect to, and thus is able to acquire replicas only. It is not able to share source objects (only QRemoteObjectHost and QRemoteObjectRegistryHost Nodes can share).
trans-unit.target: QRemoteObjectNode没有其他节点可以连接到的URL，因此只能获取副本。它不能共享源对象（只有QRemoteObjectHost和QRemoteObjectRegistryHost节点可以共享）。

trans-unit.source: A QRemoteObjectRegistryHost has the same capability that a QRemoteObjectHost has (which includes everything a QRemoteObjectNode supports), and in addition is the owner of the Registry. Any QRemoteObjectHost node that connects to this Node will have all of their Source objects made available by the Registry.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRemoteObjectRegistryHost具有相同的功能，一个QRemoteObjectHost具有（其包括一切QRemoteObjectNode载体），并且另外是注册表的所有者。连接到该节点的任何QRemoteObjectHost节点都将使注册表具有所有其Source对象。

trans-unit.source: A QRenderTargetOutput specifies the attachment point and parameters for texture that is attached to render target. In addition to the attachment point, texture miplevel, layer and cubemap face can be specified. The texture attached to the QRenderTargetOutput must be compatible with the given parameters.
trans-unit.target: QRenderTargetOutput指定了附加在渲染目标上的纹理的附着点和参数。除了附加点外,还可以指定纹理miplevel、层和cubemap面。附着在QRenderTargetOutput上的纹理必须与给定的参数兼容。

trans-unit.source: A QResource can either be loaded with an absolute path, either treated as a file system rooted with a / character, or in resource notation rooted with a : character. A relative resource can also be opened which will be found in the list of paths returned by QDir::searchPaths().
trans-unit.target: QResource既可以加载绝对路径，也可以将其视为以 / 字符为根的文件系统，也可以以以 : 字符为根的资源符号表示。也可以打开一个相对资源，该资源将在QDir :: searchPaths（）返回的路径列表中找到。

trans-unit.source: A QResource that is representing a file will have data backing it, this data can possibly be compressed, in which case qUncompress() must be used to access the real data; this happens implicitly when accessed through a QFile. A QResource that is representing a directory will have only children and no data.
trans-unit.target: 代表文件的QResource将有支持它的数据，该数据可能会被压缩，在这种情况下，必须使用qUncompress（）来访问实际数据；通过QFile访问时隐式发生这种情况。代表目录的QResource将只有子级，没有数据。

trans-unit.source: A QSGAbstractRenderer created by a QSGEngine allows you to set your QSGNode tree through setRootNode() and control the rendering viewport through setDeviceRect(), setViewportRect() and setProjectionMatrixToRect(). You can finally trigger the rendering to the desired framebuffer through renderScene().
trans-unit.target: 由QSGEngine创建的QSGAbstractRenderer允许您通过setRootNode（）设置QSGNode树，并通过setDeviceRect（），setViewportRect（）和setProjectionMatrixToRect（）控制渲染视口。您最终可以通过renderScene（）将渲染触发到所需的帧缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: A QSGEngine can be used to render a tree of QSGNode directly on a QWindow or QOpenGLFramebufferObject without any integration with QML, QQuickWindow or QQuickItem and the convenience that they provide.
trans-unit.target: QSGEngine可用于直接在QWindow或QOpenGLFramebufferObject上呈现QSGNode树，而无需与QML，QQuickWindow或QQuickItem集成以及它们提供的便利。

trans-unit.source: A QScissorTest class enables scissor test, which discards fragments outside the rectangular area of the screen specified by the left, bottom, width and height properties.
trans-unit.target: 一个QScissorTest类可以实现剪刀测试,它可以丢弃由左、底、宽、高属性指定的屏幕矩形区域外的碎片。

trans-unit.source: A QScopedArrayPointer is a QScopedPointer that defaults to deleting the object it is pointing to with the delete[] operator. It also features operator[] for convenience, so we can write:
trans-unit.target: QScopedArrayPointer是QScopedPointer，默认情况下是使用delete []运算符删除其指向的对象。为了方便起见，它还具有operator []的功能，因此我们可以编写：

trans-unit.source: A QSemaphoreReleaser can be canceled by a call to cancel(). A canceled semaphore releaser will no longer call QSemaphore::release() in its destructor.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用cancel（）来取消QSemaphoreReleaser 。取消的信号量释放器将不再在其析构函数中调用QSemaphore :: release（）。

trans-unit.source: A QSequentialIterable::const_iterator can only be created by a QSequentialIterable instance, and can be used in a way similar to other stl-style iterators.
trans-unit.target: QSequentialIterable :: const_iterator只能由QSequentialIterable实例创建，并且可以与其他stl样式迭代器类似的方式使用。

trans-unit.source: A QSequentialIterable::iterator can only be created by a QSequentialIterable instance, and can be used in a way similar to other stl-style iterators.
trans-unit.target: QSequentialIterable :: iterator只能由QSequentialIterable实例创建，并且可以与其他stl样式迭代器类似的方式使用。

trans-unit.source: A QSharedPointer object can be created from a normal pointer, another QSharedPointer object or by promoting a QWeakPointer object to a strong reference.
trans-unit.target: 可以从普通指针，另一个QSharedPointer对象或通过将QWeakPointer对象提升为强引用来创建QSharedPointer对象。

trans-unit.source: A QSqlError object can provide database-specific error data, including the driverText() and databaseText() messages (or both concatenated together as text()), and the nativeErrorCode() and type().
trans-unit.target: 一个QSqlError对象可以提供特定于数据库的错误数据，包括driverText（）和databaseText（）消息（或两者同时作为文本（）串联在一起）以及nativeErrorCode（）和type（）。

trans-unit.source: A QSqlField object can provide some meta-data about the field, for example, its name(), variant type(), length(), precision(), defaultValue(), typeID(), and its requiredStatus(), isGenerated() and isReadOnly(). The field's data can be checked to see if it isNull(), and its value() retrieved. When editing the data can be set with setValue() or set to NULL with clear().
trans-unit.target: QSqlField对象可以提供有关该字段的一些元数据，例如，其名称（），变量类型（），长度（），精度（），defaultValue（），typeID（）以及其requiredStatus（），isGenerated（ ）和isReadOnly（）。可以检查字段的数据以查看它是否为isNull（）以及是否检索到其value（）。编辑数据时，可以使用setValue（）设置，也可以使用clear（）设置为NULL 。

trans-unit.source: A QSqlField object can provide some meta-data about the field, for example, its name(), variant type(), length(), precision(), defaultValue(), typeID(), and its requiredStatus(), isGenerated() and isReadOnly(). The field's data can be checked to see if it isNull(), and its value() retrieved. When editing the data can be set with setValue() or set to NULL with clear().
trans-unit.target: QSqlField对象可以提供有关该字段的一些元数据，例如，其名称（），变量type（），长度（），精度（），defaultValue（），typeID（）以及其requiredStatus（），isGenerated（ ）和isReadOnly（）。可以检查字段的数据以查看它是否为isNull（）以及是否检索到其value（）。编辑数据时，可以使用setValue（）设置，也可以使用clear（）设置为NULL 。

trans-unit.source: A QStackedLayout can be populated with a number of child widgets ("pages"). For example:
trans-unit.target: 一个QStackedLayout可以被许多子部件("页面")填充。例如:

trans-unit.source: A QString can embed '\0' characters (QChar::Null). The size() function always returns the size of the whole string, including embedded '\0' characters.
trans-unit.target: QString可以嵌入'\ 0'字符（QChar :: Null）。的尺寸（）函数总是返回整个字符串的大小，包括嵌入式“\ 0”字符。

trans-unit.source: A QStringView references a contiguous portion of a UTF-16 string it does not own. It acts as an interface type to all kinds of UTF-16 string, without the need to construct a QString first.
trans-unit.target: QStringView引用它不拥有的UTF-16字符串的连续部分。它充当所有UTF-16字符串的接口类型，而无需首先构造QString。

trans-unit.source: A QTableView implements a table view that displays items from a model. This class is used to provide standard tables that were previously provided by the QTable class, but using the more flexible approach provided by Qt's model/view architecture.
trans-unit.target: QTableView实现了一个显示模型中的项目的表格视图。该类用于提供以前由QTable类提供的标准表格,但使用Qt的模型/视图架构提供的更灵活的方法。

trans-unit.source: A QTestEventList can be populated with GUI events that can be stored as test data for later usage, or be replayed on any QWidget. QTestEventList provides convenience functions for populating the list.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用GUI事件填充QTestEventList，这些GUI事件可以存储为测试数据以供以后使用，也可以在任何QWidget上重播。QTestEventList提供了用于填充列表的便捷功能。

trans-unit.source: A QTestEventList can be populated with GUI events that can be stored as test data for later usage, or be replayed on any QWidget. QTestEventList provides convenience functions for populating the list.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用GUI事件填充QTestEventList，这些GUI事件可以存储为测试数据以供以后使用，也可以在任何QWidget上重播。QTestEventList提供了用于填充列表的便捷功能。

trans-unit.source: A QTextCursor also has an anchor() position. The text that is between the anchor() and the position() is the selection. If anchor() == position() there is no selection.
trans-unit.target: 一个QTextCursor也有一个anchor（）位置。锚点（）和位置（）之间的文本是所选内容。如果锚点（）==位置（），则没有选择。

trans-unit.source: A QTextDocument can be edited programmatically using a QTextCursor, and its contents can be examined by traversing the document structure. The entire document structure is stored as a hierarchy of document elements beneath the root frame, found with the rootFrame() function. Alternatively, if you just want to iterate over the textual contents of the document you can use begin(), end(), and findBlock() to retrieve text blocks that you can examine and iterate over.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用QTextCursor以编程方式编辑QTextDocument，并且可以通过遍历文档结构来检查其内容。整个文档结构作为文档元素的层次结构存储在根框架下，可通过rootFrame（）函数找到。另外，如果只想遍历文档的文本内容，则可以使用begin（），end（）和findBlock（）检索可以检查和遍历的文本块。

trans-unit.source: A QTextDocumentFragment is a fragment of rich text, that can be inserted into a QTextDocument. A document fragment can be created from a QTextDocument, from a QTextCursor's selection, or from another document fragment. Document fragments can also be created by the static functions, fromPlainText() and fromHtml().
trans-unit.target: QTextDocumentFragment是富文本片段，可以将其插入QTextDocument中。可以从QTextDocument，QTextCursor的选择或另一个文档片段创建文档片段。也可以通过静态函数fromPlainText（）和fromHtml（）创建文档片段。

trans-unit.source: A QTextFormat is a generic class used for describing the format of parts of a QTextDocument. The derived classes QTextCharFormat, QTextBlockFormat, QTextListFormat, and QTextTableFormat are usually more useful, and describe the formatting that is applied to specific parts of the document.
trans-unit.target: QTextFormat是用于描述QTextDocument部分格式的通用类。派生类QTextCharFormat，QTextBlockFormat，QTextListFormat和QTextTableFormat通常更有用，它们描述了应用于文档特定部分的格式。

trans-unit.source: A QThread object manages one thread of control within the program. QThreads begin executing in run(). By default, run() starts the event loop by calling exec() and runs a Qt event loop inside the thread.
trans-unit.target: 一个QThread对象管理程序中的一个控制线程。QThreads开始在run（）中执行。默认情况下，run（）通过调用exec（）启动事件循环，并在线程内部运行Qt事件循环。

trans-unit.source: A QTime object contains a clock time, which it can express as the numbers of hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds since midnight. It provides functions for comparing times and for manipulating a time by adding a number of milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 一个QTime对象包含一个时钟时间,它可以用午夜以来的时、分、秒和毫秒数来表示。它提供了用于比较时间和通过添加毫秒数来操作时间的函数。

trans-unit.source: A QTime object contains a clock time, which it can express as the numbers of hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds since midnight. It provides functions for comparing times and for manipulating a time by adding a number of milliseconds. QTime objects should be passed by value rather than by reference to const; they simply package int.
trans-unit.target: QTime对象包含一个时钟时间，它可以表示为自午夜以来的小时数，分钟数，秒数和毫秒数。它提供了用于比较时间和通过增加毫秒数来操纵时间的功能。QTime对象应该通过值传递，而不是通过引用const传递。他们只是打包 int 。

trans-unit.source: A QTime object is typically created either by giving the number of hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds explicitly, or by using the static function currentTime(), which creates a QTime object that represents the system's local time.
trans-unit.target: 通常，通过显式给出小时，分钟，秒和毫秒数，或使用静态函数currentTime（）创建QTime对象，该函数创建代表系统本地时间的QTime对象。

trans-unit.source: A QTransform object can be built using the setMatrix(), scale(), rotate(), translate() and shear() functions. Alternatively, it can be built by applying basic matrix operations. The matrix can also be defined when constructed, and it can be reset to the identity matrix (the default) using the reset() function.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setMatrix（），scale（），rotate（），translate（）和剪切（）函数来构建QTransform对象。或者，可以通过应用基本矩阵运算来构建它。也可以在构造矩阵时对其进行定义，并可以使用reset（）函数将其重置为恒等矩阵（默认值）。

trans-unit.source: A QTransform object contains a 3 x 3 matrix. The m31 (dx) and m32 (dy) elements specify horizontal and vertical translation. The m11 and m22 elements specify horizontal and vertical scaling. The m21 and m12 elements specify horizontal and vertical
trans-unit.target: 一个QTransform对象包含一个3 x 3的矩阵。的 m31 （ dx ）和 m32 （ dy ）元素指定的水平和垂直平移。的 m11 和 m22 元素指定水平和垂直缩放。的 m21 和 m12 元素指定的水平和垂直

trans-unit.source: A QTreeView implements a tree representation of items from a model. This class is used to provide standard hierarchical lists that were previously provided by the QListView class, but using the more flexible approach provided by Qt's model/view architecture.
trans-unit.target: QTreeView实现了模型中项目的树形表示。此类用于提供以前由 QListView 类提供的标准层次列表，但使用Qt的模型/视图体系结构提供的更灵活的方法。

trans-unit.source: A QUndoCommand has an associated text(). This is a short string describing what the command does. It is used to update the text properties of the stack's undo and redo actions; see QUndoStack::createUndoAction() and QUndoStack::createRedoAction().
trans-unit.target: QUndoCommand具有关联的文本（）。这是描述命令功能的简短字符串。它用于更新堆栈的撤消和重做操作的文本属性。请参见QUndoStack :: createUndoAction（）和QUndoStack :: createRedoAction（）。

trans-unit.source: A QUndoCommand represents a single editing action on a document; for example, inserting or deleting a block of text in a text editor. QUndoCommand can apply a change to the document with redo() and undo the change with undo(). The implementations for these functions must be provided in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: QUndoCommand表示对文档的单个编辑操作；例如，在文本编辑器中插入或删除文本块。QUndoCommand可以使用redo（）将更改应用到文档，并使用undo（）撤消更改。这些功能的实现必须在派生类中提供。

trans-unit.source: A QUndoGroup is also useful in conjunction with QUndoView. If a QUndoView is set to watch a group using QUndoView::setGroup(), it will update itself to display the active stack.
trans-unit.target: QUndoGroup与QUndoView结合使用也很有用。如果使用QUndoView :: setGroup（）将QUndoView设置为监视组，它将更新自身以显示活动堆栈。

trans-unit.source: A QUtf8StringView references a contiguous portion of a UTF-8 string it does not own. It acts as an interface type to all kinds of UTF-8 string, without the need to construct a QString or QByteArray first.
trans-unit.target: QUtf8StringView引用它不拥有的UTF-8字符串的连续部分。它充当所有UTF-8字符串的接口类型，而无需首先构造QString或QByteArray。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant object holds a single value of a single type() at a time. (Some type()s are multi-valued, for example a string list.) You can find out what type, T, the variant holds, convert it to a different type using convert(), get its value using one of the toT() functions (e.g., toSize()) and check whether the type can be converted to a particular type using canConvert().
trans-unit.target: 一个QVariant对象一次拥有一个单一类型（）的单一值。（某些类型（）是多值的，例如一个字符串列表。）您可以找出哪种类型T（该变体保留），使用convert（）将其转换为其他类型，并使用toT之一获取其值（）函数（例如toSize（）），并检查是否可以使用canConvert（）将类型转换为特定类型。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant object holds a single value of a single type() at a time. (Some type()s are multi-valued, for example a string list.) You can find out what type, T, the variant holds, convert it to a different type using convert(), get its value using one of the toT() functions (e.g., toSize()) and check whether the type can be converted to a particular type using canConvert().
trans-unit.target: 一个QVariant对象一次拥有单个type（）的单个值。（某些type（）是多值的，例如一个字符串列表。）您可以找出哪种类型T（变体持有），使用convert（）将其转换为其他类型，并使用toT之一获取其值。 （）函数（例如toSize（）），并检查是否可以使用canConvert（）将类型转换为特定类型。

trans-unit.source: A QVideoFrame encapsulates the pixel data of a video frame, and information about the frame.
trans-unit.target: 一个QVideoFrame封装了一个视频帧的像素数据,以及该帧的信息。
