trans-unit.source: A QWebEngineUrlRequestJob is given to QWebEngineUrlSchemeHandler::requestStarted() and must be handled by the derived implementations of the class. The job can be handled by calling either reply(), redirect(), or fail().
trans-unit.target: QWebEngineUrlSchemeHandler :: requestStarted（）被赋予QWebEngineUrlRequestJob，并且必须由该类的派生实现处理。可以通过调用reply（），redirect（）或fail（）来处理作业。

trans-unit.source: A Qt Quick application requires also additional dependencies:
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt Quick应用程序还需要额外的依赖性。

trans-unit.source: A Qt Quick game for touch devices that uses SpriteSequence, ParticleSystem, Emitter, and Wander types to animate objects and the SoundEffect type to play sound effects
trans-unit.target: 一款适用于触摸设备的Qt Quick游戏,它使用SpriteSequence、ParticleSystem、Emitter和Wander类型对对象进行动画制作,并使用SoundEffect类型播放声音效果。

trans-unit.source: A Qt Quick item type for displaying and interacting with a ShellSurface. More...
trans-unit.target: 用于显示ShellSurface并与之交互的Qt Quick项目类型。更多...

trans-unit.source: A Qt application can host any ActiveScript engine installed on the system. The script engine can then run script code that accesses the COM objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt应用程序可以托管系统上安装的任何ActiveScript引擎。脚本引擎就可以运行访问COM对象的脚本代码。

trans-unit.source: A Qt application can load this QML document and set the value of myModel to a QStringList:
trans-unit.target: Qt应用程序可以加载此QML文档，并将 myModel 的值设置为QStringList：

trans-unit.source: A Qt help project collects all data necessary to generate a compressed help file. Along with the actual help data, like the table of contents, index keywords and help documents, it contains some extra information like a namespace to identify the help file. One help project stands for one documentation set, for example the Qt Assistant Manual.
trans-unit.target: Qt帮助项目收集生成压缩帮助文件所需的所有数据。除了诸如目录，索引关键字和帮助文档之类的实际帮助数据外，它还包含一些其他信息，例如用于标识帮助文件的名称空间。一个帮助项目代表一个文档集，例如Qt Assistant Manual。

trans-unit.source: A Qt help project collects all data necessary to generate a compressed help file. Along with the actual help data, like the table of contents, index keywords and help documents, it contains some extra information like a namespace to identify the help file. One help project stands for one documentation set, for example the Qt Assistant Manual.
trans-unit.target: Qt帮助项目收集生成压缩帮助文件所需的所有数据。除了诸如目录，索引关键字和帮助文档之类的实际帮助数据外，它还包含一些其他信息，例如用于标识帮助文件的名称空间。一个帮助项目代表一个文档集，例如Qt Assistant Manual。

trans-unit.source: A Qt help project collects all data necessary to generate a compressed help file. Along with the actual help data, like the table of contents, index keywords and help documents, it contains some extra information like a namespace to identify the help file. One help project stands for one documentation set, for example the qmake Manual.
trans-unit.target: Qt帮助项目收集生成压缩帮助文件所需的所有数据。除了诸如目录，索引关键字和帮助文档之类的实际帮助数据外，它还包含一些其他信息，例如用于标识帮助文件的名称空间。一个帮助项目代表一个文档集，例如qmake Manual。

trans-unit.source: A Quick Start to Qt Designer
trans-unit.target: Qt Designer的快速入门

trans-unit.source: A RadioButton is an option button that can be switched on (checked) or off (unchecked). Radio buttons typically present the user with a "one of many" choices. In a group of radio buttons, only one radio button can be checked at a time; if the user selects another button, the previously selected button is switched off.
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮是一个可以打开(选中)或关闭(不选中)的选项按钮。单选按钮通常向用户展示 "众多选择中的一个"。在一组单选按钮中,一次只能选中一个单选按钮;如果用户选择了另一个按钮,则之前选中的按钮被关闭。

trans-unit.source: A Real Example
trans-unit.target: 一个真实的例子

trans-unit.source: A Remote Object Replica is a QObject proxy for another QObject (called the Source object). Once initialized, a replica can be considered a "latent copy" of the Source object. That is, every change to a Q_PROPERTY on the Source, or signal emitted by the Source will be updated/emitted by all Replica objects. Latency is introduced by process scheduling by any OSes involved and network communication latency. As long as the replica has been initialized and the communication is not disrupted, receipt and order of changes is guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 远程对象副本是另一个QObject（称为源对象）的QObject代理。初始化后，副本可以被视为Source对象的“潜在副本” 。也就是说，对Source上的Q_PROPERTY的任何更改，或由Source发出的信号都将由所有副本对象更新/发出。延迟是由所涉及的任何操作系统的进程调度和网络通信延迟引入的。只要副本已初始化且通信不中断，就可以保证更改的接收和顺序。

trans-unit.source: A Remote Object Source is the QObject that is responsible for the implementation of the exposed API.
trans-unit.target: 远程对象源是QObject，负责实现公开的API。

trans-unit.source: A RenderPass specifies a single rendering pass - an instance of shader program execution - used by Technique. A Render pass consists of a ShaderProgram and a list of FilterKey objects, a list of RenderState objects and a list of Parameter objects.
trans-unit.target: RenderPass指定技术使用的单个渲染过程-着色器程序执行的实例。渲染过程包括一个ShaderProgram和一个FilterKey对象列表，一个RenderState对象列表以及一个Parameter对象列表。

trans-unit.source: A RenderPassFilter FrameGraph node is used to select which RenderPass objects are selected for drawing. When RenderPassFilter is present in the FrameGraph, only the RenderPass objects, whose FilterKey objects match the keys in RenderPassFilter are selected for rendering. If no RenderPassFilter is present, then all RenderPass objects are selected for rendering.
trans-unit.target: RenderPassFilter FrameGraph节点用于选择为绘图选择的RenderPass对象。当FrameGraph中存在RenderPassFilter时，仅选择其FilterKey对象与RenderPassFilter中的键匹配的RenderPass对象进行渲染。如果不存在RenderPassFilter，则将选择所有RenderPass对象进行渲染。

trans-unit.source: A RenderState type is abstract base class for all render states. One can not instantiate RenderState directly, but through its subclasses.
trans-unit.target: RenderState类型是所有渲染状态的抽象基类。我们不能直接实例化RenderState,而是通过它的子类。

trans-unit.source: A RenderTarget comprises of RenderTargetOutput objects, which specify the the buffers the render target is rendering to. The user can specify MRT(Multiple Render Targets) by attaching multiple textures to different attachment points. The results are undefined if the user tries to attach multiple textures to the same attachment point. At render time, only the draw buffers specified in the RenderTargetSelector are used.
trans-unit.target: 一个RenderTarget包含RenderTargetOutput对象，这些对象指定渲染目标正在渲染到的缓冲区。用户可以通过将多个纹理附加到不同的附加点来指定MRT（多个渲染目标）。如果用户尝试将多个纹理附加到同一附加点，则结果是不确定的。在渲染时，仅使用在RenderTargetSelector中指定的绘图缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: A RenderTargetOutput specifies the attachment point and parameters for texture that is attached to render target. In addition to the attachment point, texture miplevel, layer and cubemap face can be specified. The texture attached to the RenderTargetOutput must be compatible with the given parameters.
trans-unit.target: RenderTargetOutput指定了附加在渲染目标上的纹理的附着点和参数。除了附加点外,还可以指定纹理miplevel、层和cubemap面。附着在RenderTargetOutput上的纹理必须与给定参数兼容。

trans-unit.source: A RenderTargetSelector is used to select active RenderTarget for the FrameGraph. When RenderTargetSelector is present in the FrameGraph, the rendering is directed into Texture objects or draw buffers instead of the surface specified in the RenderSurfaceSelector.
trans-unit.target: RenderTargetSelector用于为FrameGraph选择活动的RenderTarget。当FrameGraph中存在RenderTargetSelector时，将渲染定向到Texture对象或绘制缓冲区中，而不是RenderSurfaceSelector中指定的表面。

trans-unit.source: A Repeater's model can be any of the supported data models. Additionally, like delegates for other views, a Repeater delegate can access its index within the repeater, as well as the model data relevant to the delegate. See the delegate property documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 转发器模型可以是任何受支持的数据模型。另外，像其他视图的委托一样，Repeater委托可以访问其在转发器中的索引以及与该委托相关的模型数据。有关详细信息，请参见委托属性文档。

trans-unit.source: A Repeater's model can be any of the supported data models. Additionally, like delegates for other views, a Repeater delegate can access its index within the repeater, as well as the model data relevant to the delegate. See the delegate property documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 转发器的模型可以是任何受支持的数据模型。此外，像其他视图的委托一样，Repeater委托可以访问其在转发器中的索引以及与该委托相关的模型数据。有关详细信息，请参见委托属性文档。

trans-unit.source: A Route type contains high level information about a route, such as the length the route, the estimated travel time for the route, and enough information to render a basic image of the route on a map.
trans-unit.target: 路线类型包含了路线的高级信息,如路线的长度、路线的预计旅行时间,以及足以在地图上显示路线基本图像的信息。

trans-unit.source: A RouteQuery is used to pack all the parameters necessary to make a request to a routing service, which can then populate the contents of a RouteModel.
trans-unit.target: RouteQuery用于打包向路由服务发出请求所需的所有参数，然后可以填充RouteModel的内容。

trans-unit.source: A RouteSegment instance has information about the physical layout of the route segment, the length of the route and estimated time required to traverse the route segment and optional RouteManeuvers associated with the end of the route segment.
trans-unit.target: 一个RouteSegment实例有关于路线段的物理布局、路线的长度和穿越路线段所需的估计时间以及与路线段末端相关的可选RouteManeuvers的信息。

trans-unit.source: A SQL field name
trans-unit.target: 一个SQL字段名

trans-unit.source: A SQL table name
trans-unit.target: 一个SQL表名

trans-unit.source: A ScissorTest type enables scissor test, which discards fragments outside the rectangular area of the screen specified by the left, bottom, width and height properties.
trans-unit.target: ScissorTest类型可以实现剪刀测试,它可以丢弃由左、底、宽、高属性指定的屏幕矩形区域外的碎片。

trans-unit.source: A ScrollView can be used either to replace a Flickable or decorate an existing Flickable. Depending on the platform, it will add scroll bars and a content frame.
trans-unit.target: ScrollView可用于替换Flickable或装饰现有Flickable。根据平台的不同，它将添加滚动条和内容框架。

trans-unit.source: A Shift key on the keyboard is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 键盘上的Shift键被按下。

trans-unit.source: A Shift key on the keyboard must be pressed.
trans-unit.target: 必须按下键盘上的Shift键。

trans-unit.source: A Short Path to XQuery
trans-unit.target: 通往XQuery的捷径

trans-unit.source: A Simple Example
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的例子

trans-unit.source: A Simple Forward Renderer
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的正向渲染器

trans-unit.source: A Simple Plugin
trans-unit.target: 一个单一的插件

trans-unit.source: A Simple State Machine
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的状态机

trans-unit.source: A Small Example
trans-unit.target: 一个小例子

trans-unit.source: A SmoothedAnimation animates a property's value to a set target value using an ease in/out quad easing curve. When the target value changes, the easing curves used to animate between the old and new target values are smoothly spliced together to create a smooth movement to the new target value that maintains the current velocity.
trans-unit.target: 平滑动画(SmoothedAnimation)使用缓进/缓出的四条缓和曲线将一个属性的值动画到设定的目标值。当目标值发生变化时,用于在新旧目标值之间进行动画的缓和曲线会平滑地拼接在一起,以创建一个保持当前速度的平滑运动到新的目标值。

trans-unit.source: A SmoothedAnimation can be configured by setting the velocity at which the animation should occur, or the duration that the animation should take. If both the velocity and duration are specified, the one that results in the quickest animation is chosen for each change in the target value.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置动画发生的速度或动画的持续时间来配置SmoothedAnimation 。如果同时指定了速度和持续时间，则将为目标值的每次更改选择产生最快动画的速度和持续时间。

trans-unit.source: A SortPolicy class stores the sorting type used by the FrameGraph. The sort types determine how drawable entities are sorted before drawing to determine the drawing order. When SortPolicy is present in the FrameGraph, the sorting mechanism is determined by the sortTypes list. Multiple sort types can be used simultaneously. If SortPolicy is not present in the FrameGraph, entities are drawn in the order they appear in the entity hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: SortPolicy类存储FrameGraph使用的排序类型。排序类型确定可绘制实体在绘制之前如何排序以确定绘制顺序。当FrameGraph中存在SortPolicy时，排序机制由sortTypes列表确定。可以同时使用多种排序类型。如果FrameGraph中不存在SortPolicy，则按照在实体层次结构中出现的顺序绘制实体。

trans-unit.source: A StateChangeScript is run upon entering a state. You can optionally use ScriptAction to specify the point in the transition at which the StateChangeScript should be run.
trans-unit.target: StateChangeScript在进入状态后运行。您可以选择使用ScriptAction来指定过渡中应运行StateChangeScript的点。

trans-unit.source: A StatusIndicator in the active state.
trans-unit.target: 处于活动状态的StatusIndicator。

trans-unit.source: A StatusIndicator in the inactive state.
trans-unit.target: 一个处于非活动状态的StatusIndicator。

trans-unit.source: A StencilMask type specifies the mask for the stencil test. Mask can be specified separately for the front-facing and back-facing polygons. The stencil test reference value and stencil buffer value gets and'd with the mask prior to applying stencil function.
trans-unit.target: StencilMask类型指定钢网测试的遮罩。可以为正面和背面的多边形分别指定遮罩。模版测试参考值和模版缓冲值在应用模版功能之前与掩模一起获得。

trans-unit.source: A StencilOperation type specifies the stencil operations for the front- and back-facing polygons. The stencil operation control what is done to fragment when the stencil and depth test pass or fail.
trans-unit.target: StencilOperation类型指定了正面和背面多边形的钢网操作。模板操作控制了当模版和深度测试通过或失败时,对碎片的处理。

trans-unit.source: A StencilTest type specifies argument for the stencil test. The stencil test comprises of three arguments: stencil test function, stencil test mask and stencil reference value. StencilTest allows these arguments to be set for both front- and back-facing polygons separately.
trans-unit.target: StencilTest类型指定钢网测试的参数。模板测试包括三个参数:模板测试函数、模板测试掩码和模板参考值。StencilTest允许为正面和背面的多边形分别设置这些参数。

trans-unit.source: A Stylus.
trans-unit.target: 一支手写笔。

trans-unit.source: A Swipe gesture.
trans-unit.target: A刷卡手势。

trans-unit.source: A Switch is a toggle button that can be switched on (checked) or off (unchecked). Switches are typically used to represent features in an application that can be enabled or disabled without affecting others.
trans-unit.target: 开关是一个可以打开(选中)或关闭(不选中)的切换按钮。开关通常用于表示应用程序中的功能,可以在不影响其他功能的情况下启用或禁用。

trans-unit.source: A TCP connection must be established to a remote host and port before any data transfer can begin. Once the connection has been established, the IP address and port of the peer are available through QTcpSocket::peerAddress() and QTcpSocket::peerPort(). At any time, the peer can close the connection, and data transfer will then stop immediately.
trans-unit.target: 必须先与远程主机和端口建立TCP连接，然后才能开始任何数据传输。建立连接后，即可通过QTcpSocket :: peerAddress（）和QTcpSocket :: peerPort（）获得对等方的IP地址和端口。对等方可以随时关闭连接，然后数据传输将立即停止。

trans-unit.source: A TCP connection using the standard TCP/IP protocol - supports connections between devices as well as between processes on the same device.
trans-unit.target: 使用标准TCP/IP协议的TCP连接--支持设备之间以及同一设备上的进程之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: A Tab item inherits from Loader and provides a similar API.
trans-unit.target: Tab项继承自Loader,并提供类似的API。

trans-unit.source: A TabPosition enum value that indicates the tab's position on the bar relative to the other tabs.
trans-unit.target: 一个TabPosition枚举值,表示标签在栏上相对于其他标签的位置。

trans-unit.source: A TableView displays data from models created from built-in QML types such as ListModel and XmlListModel, which populates the first column only in a TableView. To create models with multiple columns, either use TableModel or a C++ model that inherits QAbstractItemModel.
trans-unit.target: TableView显示根据内置QML类型（例如ListModel和XmlListModel）创建的模型中的数据，这些模型仅在TableView中填充第一列。要创建具有多列的模型，请使用TableModel或继承QAbstractItemModel的C ++模型。

trans-unit.source: A TableView displays data from models created from built-in QML types such as ListModel and XmlListModel, which populates the first column only in a TableView. To create models with multiple columns, either use TableModel or a C++ model that inherits QAbstractItemModel.
trans-unit.target: TableView显示根据内置QML类型（例如ListModel和XmlListModel）创建的模型中的数据，这些模型仅在TableView中填充第一列。要创建具有多列的模型，请使用TableModel或继承QAbstractItemModel的C ++模型。

trans-unit.source: A TableView has a model that defines the data to be displayed, and a delegate that defines how the data should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: TableView具有定义要显示的数据的模型和定义应如何显示数据的委托。

trans-unit.source: A TableView is similar to ListView, and adds scroll bars, selection, and resizable header sections. As with ListView, data for each row is provided through a model:
trans-unit.target: TableView与ListView相似，并添加了滚动条，选择和可调整大小的标题部分。与ListView一样，每一行的数据都是通过模型提供的：

trans-unit.source: A Tap gesture.
trans-unit.target: A 轻点手势。

trans-unit.source: A Tap-And-Hold (Long-Tap) gesture.
trans-unit.target: 点击并按住(长按)手势。

trans-unit.source: A Technique specifies a set of RenderPass objects, FilterKey objects, Parameter objects and a GraphicsApiFilter, which together define a rendering technique the given graphics API can render. The filter keys are used by TechniqueFilter to select specific techniques at specific parts of the FrameGraph. If two Parameter instances with the same name are specified in a Technique and a RenderPass, the one in Technique overrides the one used in the RenderPass.
trans-unit.target: 一项技术指定一组RenderPass对象，FilterKey对象，Parameter对象和GraphicsApiFilter，它们共同定义了给定图形API可以渲染的渲染技术。筛选键由TechniqueFilter用于在FrameGraph的特定部分选择特定的技术。如果在Technique和RenderPass中指定了两个具有相同名称的Parameter实例，则Technique中的一个将覆盖RenderPass中使用的一个。

trans-unit.source: A TechniqueFilter specifies which techniques are used by the FrameGraph when rendering the entities. TechniqueFilter specifies a list of FilterKey objects and Parameter objects. When TechniqueFilter is present in the FrameGraph, only the techiques matching the keys in list are used for rendering. The parameters in the list can be used to set values for shader parameters. The parameters in TechniqueFilter are overridden by parameters in Technique and RenderPass.
trans-unit.target: TechniqueFilter指定渲染实体时FrameGraph使用哪些技术。TechniqueFilter指定FilterKey对象和Parameter对象的列表。当FrameGraph中存在TechniqueFilter时，仅使用与列表中的键匹配的技术进行渲染。列表中的参数可用于设置着色器参数的值。TechniqueFilter和RenderPass中的参数将覆盖TechniqueFilter中的参数。

trans-unit.source: A TextArea that is placed inside a ScrollView does the following:
trans-unit.target: 放置在ScrollView内的TextArea会执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: A Thermometer.
trans-unit.target: 一个温度计。

trans-unit.source: A Timer can be used to trigger an action either once, or repeatedly at a given interval.
trans-unit.target: 定时器可以用来触发一个动作,可以是一次,也可以是在给定的时间间隔内反复进行。

trans-unit.source: A Title bar, like those used in QMdiSubWindow.
trans-unit.target: 标题栏，类似于QMdiSubWindow中使用的标题栏。

trans-unit.source: A TouchEventSequence is created by calling TestCase.touchEvent(). The type can not be directly instantiated. Each method provided by the type returns the same object, allowing chained calls.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用TestCase.touchEvent（）创建一个TouchEventSequence 。该类型不能直接实例化。该类型提供的每个方法都返回相同的对象，从而允许链式调用。

trans-unit.source: A Transition defines the animations to be applied when a State change occurs.
trans-unit.target: 过渡定义了发生状态更改时要应用的动画。

trans-unit.source: A TreeView implements a tree representation of items from a model.
trans-unit.target: TreeView实现了模型中项目的树状表示。

trans-unit.source: A Trivial Example
trans-unit.target: 一个微不足道的例子

trans-unit.source: A Twitter search client with 3D effects
trans-unit.target: 一个具有3D效果的Twitter搜索客户端

trans-unit.source: A URI handling function was used incorrectly or the URI provided is malformed.
trans-unit.target: URI处理函数使用错误,或者提供的URI格式错误。

trans-unit.source: A URL can also be constructed piece by piece by calling setScheme(), setUserName(), setPassword(), setHost(), setPort(), setPath(), setQuery() and setFragment(). Some convenience functions are also available: setAuthority() sets the user name, password, host and port. setUserInfo() sets the user name and password at once.
trans-unit.target: 也可以通过调用setScheme（），setUserName（），setPassword（），setHost（），setPort（），setPath（），setQuery（）和setFragment（）来逐个构造URL。还提供了一些便利功能：setAuthority（）设置用户名，密码，主机和端口。setUserInfo（）一次设置用户名和密码。

trans-unit.source: A URL of this type has no authority component at all. Everything after scheme name and separator character (:) will be preserved as is without validation or canonicalization. All URLs of such a scheme will be considered as having the same origin (unless the NoAccessAllowed flag is used).
trans-unit.target: 此类型的URL根本没有权限组件。方案名称和分隔符（:)之后的所有内容将按原样保留，而不进行验证或规范化。此类方案的所有URL将被视为具有相同的来源（除非使用了 NoAccessAllowed 标志）。

trans-unit.source: A UWP application may not do socket-based communication with another application running on the same host (as this would violate the sandboxing).
trans-unit.target: UWP应用程序不得与运行在同一主机上的另一个应用程序进行基于socket的通信(因为这将违反沙盒)。

trans-unit.source: A Unique Connection Name is a string in the form ":x.xxx" (where x are decimal digits) that is assigned by the D-Bus server daemon upon connection. It uniquely identifies this client in the bus.
trans-unit.target: 独特的连接名是以":x.xxx "为格式的字符串。(其中x为十进制数字),由D-Bus服务器守护进程在连接时分配。它在总线中唯一地标识了这个客户端。

trans-unit.source: A Vertex Array Object (VAO) is an OpenGL container object that encapsulates the state needed to specify per-vertex attribute data to the OpenGL pipeline. To put it another way, a VAO remembers the states of buffer objects (see QOpenGLBuffer) and their associated state (e.g. vertex attribute divisors). This allows a very easy and efficient method of switching between OpenGL buffer states for rendering different "objects" in a scene. The QOpenGLVertexArrayObject class is a thin wrapper around an OpenGL VAO.
trans-unit.target: 顶点数组对象（VAO）是OpenGL容器对象，封装了为OpenGL管道指定每个顶点属性数据所需的状态。换句话说，VAO会记住缓冲区对象的状态（请参见QOpenGLBuffer）及其关联状态（例如，顶点属性除数）。这允许在OpenGL缓冲区状态之间进行切换的非常简单有效的方法，以在场景中渲染不同的“对象”。所述QOpenGLVertexArrayObject类是围绕一个OpenGL VAO的薄包装。

trans-unit.source: A Vertex Array Object (VAO) is an OpenGL container object that encapsulates the state needed to specify per-vertex attribute data to the OpenGL pipeline. To put it another way, a VAO remembers the states of buffer objects (see QOpenGLBuffer) and their associated state (e.g. vertex attribute divisors). This allows a very easy and efficient method of switching between OpenGL buffer states for rendering different "objects" in a scene. The QOpenGLVertexArrayObject class is a thin wrapper around an OpenGL VAO.
trans-unit.target: 顶点数组对象（VAO）是OpenGL容器对象，封装了为OpenGL管道指定每个顶点属性数据所需的状态。换句话说，VAO会记住缓冲区对象的状态（请参见QOpenGLBuffer）及其关联状态（例如，顶点属性除数）。这允许在OpenGL缓冲区状态之间进行切换的一种非常简单有效的方法，用于在场景中渲染不同的“对象”。QOpenGLVertexArrayObject类是围绕OpenGL VAO的瘦包装器。

trans-unit.source: A VertexBlendAnimation type implements vertex-blend morphing animation to a target GeometryRenderer. The VertexBlendAnimation sets the correct Attributes from the morph targets to the target GeometryRenderer::geometry and calculates interpolator for the current position. Unlike with MorphingAnimation, where the blending is controller with blend weights, the blending occurs between sequential morph targets. The actual blending between the attributes must be implemented in the material. MorphPhongMaterial implements material with morphing support for phong lighting model. The blending happens between 2 attributes - 'base' and 'target'. The names for the base and target attributes are taken from the morph target names, where the base attribute retains the name it already has and the target attribute name gets 'Target' appended to the name. All morph targets in the animation should contain the attributes with same names as those in the base geometry.
trans-unit.target: VertexBlendAnimation类型将顶点混合变形动画实现到目标GeometryRenderer。VertexBlendAnimation可以将正确的属性从变形目标设置为目标GeometryRenderer :: geometry，并计算当前位置的插值器。与MorphingAnimation不同，其中混合是具有混合权重的控制器，则混合发生在顺序的变形目标之间。属性之间的实际混合必须在材料中实现。MorphPhongMaterial实现具有对Phong照明模型的变形支持的材质。混合发生在2个属性之间-“基本”和“目标”。基本属性和目标属性的名称取自变形目标名称，其中基本属性保留其已经拥有的名称，并且目标属性名称被附加在名称后的“目标”。动画中的所有变形目标都应包含与基础几何图形名称相同的属性。

trans-unit.source: A VerticalHeaderView provides labeling of the rows of a TableView. To add a vertical header to a TableView, bind the syncView property to the TableView:
trans-unit.target: VerticalHeaderView提供TableView的行的标签。要将垂直标题添加到TableView，请将syncView属性绑定到TableView：

trans-unit.source: A Waypoint is a type that allows to specify properties of a waypoint in a RouteQuery, such as the waypoint coordinate, or the angle of approach to the waypoint.
trans-unit.target: Waypoint是一种类型，它允许在RouteQuery中指定一个Waypoint的属性，例如Waypoint坐标或到Waypoint的接近角度。

trans-unit.source: A WebEngineAction is returned by the WebEngineView::action() method. It provides information about the action, such as whether it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: WebEngineAction由WebEngineView :: action（）方法返回。它提供有关操作的信息，例如是否已启用。

trans-unit.source: A WebEngineView renders web content within a QML application. More...
trans-unit.target: WebEngineView呈现QML应用程序内的Web内容。更多的...

trans-unit.source: A Window can be declared inside an Item or inside another Window; in that case the inner Window will automatically become "transient for" the outer Window: that is, most platforms will show it centered upon the outer window by default, and there may be other platform-dependent behaviors, depending also on the flags. If the nested window is intended to be a dialog in your application, you should also set flags to Qt.Dialog, because some window managers will not provide the centering behavior without that flag. You can also declare multiple windows inside a top-level QtObject, in which case the windows will have no transient relationship.
trans-unit.target: 可以在Item内或另一个Window内声明一个Window；在这种情况下，内部窗口将自动变为外部窗口的“瞬态”：也就是说，默认情况下，大多数平台会将其显示为以外部窗口为中心，并且还可能存在其他依赖于平台的行为，具体取决于标志。如果嵌套窗口打算用作应用程序中的对话框，则还应将标志设置为Qt.Dialog，因为如果没有该标志，某些窗口管理器将不会提供居中行为。您还可以在顶级QtObject内声明多个窗口，在这种情况下，这些窗口将没有临时关系。

trans-unit.source: A Window can be declared inside an Item or inside another Window; in that case the inner Window will automatically become "transient for" the outer Window: that is, most platforms will show it centered upon the outer window by default, and there may be other platform-dependent behaviors, depending also on the flags. If the nested window is intended to be a dialog in your application, you should also set flags to Qt.Dialog, because some window managers will not provide the centering behavior without that flag. You can also declare multiple windows inside a top-level QtObject, in which case the windows will have no transient relationship.
trans-unit.target: 可以在Item内或另一个Window内声明一个Window；在这种情况下，内部窗口将自动成为外部窗口的“瞬态”：也就是说，默认情况下，大多数平台会将其显示为以外部窗口为中心，并且可能还会有其他依赖于平台的行为，具体取决于标志。如果嵌套窗口打算用作应用程序中的对话框，则还应该将标志设置为Qt.Dialog，因为如果没有该标志，某些窗口管理器将不会提供居中行为。您还可以在顶级QtObject内声明多个窗口，在这种情况下，这些窗口将没有任何暂态关系。

trans-unit.source: A Window with a client area that is completely covered by another window, or is otherwise not visible may be considered obscured by Qt and may in such cases not receive expose events.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个窗口的客户端区域被另一个窗口完全覆盖,或者在其他方面不可见,则可能被Qt认为是被遮挡的,并且在这种情况下可能不会收到暴露事件。

trans-unit.source: A Y'CbCr color space defined by ITU-R BT.709 with the same values range as YCbCr_BT601. Used for HDTV.
trans-unit.target: 由ITU-R BT.709定义的Y'CbCr色彩空间,其数值范围与YCbCr_BT601相同。用于高清电视。

trans-unit.source: A Y'CbCr color space defined by ITU-R recommendation BT.601 with Y value range from 16 to 235, and Cb/Cr range from 16 to 240. Used in standard definition video.
trans-unit.target: 由ITU-R建议BT.601定义的Y'CbCr颜色空间,Y值范围为16到235,Cb/Cr范围为16到240。在标准清晰度视频中使用。

trans-unit.source: A audio encoder settings object is used to specify the audio encoder settings used by QMediaRecorder. Audio encoder settings are selected by constructing a QAudioEncoderSettings object, setting the desired properties and then passing it to a QMediaRecorder instance using the QMediaRecorder::setEncodingSettings() function.
trans-unit.target: 音频编码器设置对象用于指定QMediaRecorder使用的音频编码器设置。通过构造QAudioEncoderSettings对象，设置所需的属性，然后使用QMediaRecorder :: setEncodingSettings（）函数将其传递到QMediaRecorder实例，可以选择音频编码器设置。

trans-unit.source: A audio encoder settings object is used to specify the audio encoder settings used by QMediaRecorder. Audio encoder settings are selected by constructing a QAudioEncoderSettings object, setting the desired properties and then passing it to a QMediaRecorder instance using the QMediaRecorder::setEncodingSettings() function.
trans-unit.target: 音频编码器设置对象用于指定QMediaRecorder使用的音频编码器设置。可以通过构造QAudioEncoderSettings对象，设置所需的属性，然后使用QMediaRecorder :: setEncodingSettings（）函数将其传递到QMediaRecorder实例来选择音频编码器设置。

trans-unit.source: A backend providing only area monitoring functionalities via polling on position updates.
trans-unit.target: 通过位置更新投票,只提供区域监控功能的后台。

trans-unit.source: A background-image does not scale with the size of the widget. To provide a "skin" or background that scales along with the widget size, one must use border-image. Since the border-image property provides an alternate background, it is not required to specify a background-image when border-image is specified. In the case, when both of them are specified, the border-image draws over the background-image.
trans-unit.target: 背景图像无法随窗口小部件的大小缩放。要提供与小部件尺寸一起缩放的“外观”或背景，必须使用border-image。由于border-image属性提供了备用背景，因此在指定border-image时不需要指定背景图像。在这种情况下，如果同时指定了两者，则边框图像将覆盖背景图像。

trans-unit.source: A backtrace with the number of frames specified by the optional depth parameter (defaults to 5), and separated by the optional separator parameter (defaults to "|"). This expansion is available only on some platforms (currently only platfoms using glibc). Names are only known for exported functions. If you want to see the name of every function in your application, use QMAKE_LFLAGS += -rdynamic. When reading backtraces, take into account that frames might be missing due to inlining or tail call optimization.
trans-unit.target: 具有由可选的 depth 参数（默认为5）指定并由可选的 separator 参数（默认为“ |”）分隔的帧数的回溯。此扩展仅在某些平台上可用（当前仅使用glibc的平台）。名称仅对导出的功能已知。如果要查看应用程序中每个函数的名称，请使用 QMAKE_LFLAGS += -rdynamic 。读取回溯时，请考虑由于内联或尾部调用优化而可能丢失帧。

trans-unit.source: A ball component might have a behavior animation assigned to its x, y, and color properties. The behavior animation could be set up to simulate an elastic effect. In effect, this behavior animation would apply the elastic effect to the properties whenever the ball moves.
trans-unit.target: 球组件可能已为其 x ， y 和 color 属性分配了行为动画。可以设置行为动画来模拟弹性效果。实际上，每当球移动时，此行为动画就会将弹性效果应用于属性。

trans-unit.source: A banner component may have several icons or slogans to display, one after the other. The opacity property could transform to 1.0 denoting an opaque object. Using the SequentialAnimation type, the opacity animations will play after the preceding animation finishes. The ParallelAnimation type will play the animations at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 标语组件可能要显示几个图标或标语，一个接一个。所述 opacity 属性可以改变到 1.0 表示的不透明对象。使用SequentialAnimation类型，将在前面的动画完成后播放不透明度动画。该ParallelAnimation类型将在同一时间播放的动画。

trans-unit.source: A bar data item holds the data for a single rendered bar in a graph. Bar data proxies parse data into QBarDataItem instances for visualization.
trans-unit.target: 条形数据项保存图形中单个渲染条形的数据。条形数据代理将数据解析为QBarDataItem实例以进行可视化。

trans-unit.source: A bar legend marker is related to QAbstractBarSeries derived classes. With a bar series, each marker is related to one QBarSet.
trans-unit.target: 条形图例标记与QAbstractBarSeries派生类相关。对于条形系列，每个标记都与一个QBarSet相关。

trans-unit.source: A bar series.
trans-unit.target: A吧系列。

trans-unit.source: A bar set contains one data value for each category. The first value of a set is assumed to belong to the first category, the second one to the second category, and so on. If the set has fewer values than there are categories, the missing values are assumed to be located at the end of the set. For missing values in the middle of a set, the numerical value of zero is used. Labels for zero value sets are not shown.
trans-unit.target: 一个条形集包含每个类别的一个数据值。假设一个集合的第一个值属于第一个类别,第二个值属于第二个类别,以此类推。如果集合中的数值比类别少,则假设缺失的数值位于集合的最后。对于位于集合中间的缺失值,使用数值为零。零值集的标签不显示。

trans-unit.source: A better approach than just alerting the user to an event is to also ask the user what to do about it. Store the question in the informative text property, and set the standard buttons property to the set of buttons you want as the set of user responses. The buttons are specified by combining values from StandardButtons using the bitwise OR operator. The display order for the buttons is platform-dependent. For example, on Windows, Save is displayed to the left of Cancel, whereas on Mac OS, the order is reversed.
trans-unit.target: 除了仅警告用户事件之外，一种更好的方法是还询问用户该如何处理。将问题存储在信息丰富的文本属性中，并将“ 标准按钮”属性设置为所需的按钮集作为用户响应集。通过使用按位OR运算符组合StandardButtons中的值来指定按钮。按钮的显示顺序取决于平台。例如，在Windows上，“ 取消”的左侧显示“ 保存”，而在Mac OS上，顺序相反。

trans-unit.source: A binary large object
trans-unit.target: 二进制大型物体

trans-unit.source: A binding can contain any valid JavaScript expression or statement, as QML uses a standards compliant JavaScript engine. Bindings can access object properties, call methods and use built-in JavaScript objects such as Date and Math. Below are other possible bindings for the previous example:
trans-unit.target: 绑定可以包含任何有效的JavaScript表达式或语句，因为QML使用符合标准的JavaScript引擎。绑定可以访问对象属性，调用方法，并使用内置的JavaScript对象（例如 Date 和 Math )。以下是上一个示例的其他可能的绑定：

trans-unit.source: A binding is a JavaScript expression which is "bound" to a property. The value of the property at any point in time will be the value returned by evaluating that expression.
trans-unit.target: 绑定是一个JavaScript表达式,它被 "绑定 "到一个属性上。该属性在任何时候的值都将是评估该表达式所返回的值。

trans-unit.source: A binding to the hovered property is the easiest way to react when the cursor enters or leaves the parent Item. The point property provides more detail, including the cursor position. The acceptedDevices, acceptedPointerTypes, and acceptedModifiers properties can be used to narrow the behavior to detect hovering of specific kinds of devices or while holding a modifier key.
trans-unit.target: 当光标进入或离开父项时，绑定到悬停的属性是最简单的反应方式。的点属性提供了更多的细节，包括光标位置。的acceptedDevices，acceptedPointerTypes和acceptedModifiers属性可以被用于缩小行为，以检测特定悬停类型的装置或在其保持一个修饰键。

trans-unit.source: A bit faster equivalent of (QChar::mirroredChar(ucs4) != ucs4).
trans-unit.target: 比（QChar :: mirroredChar（ucs4）！= ucs4）快一点。

trans-unit.target: 有点快当量（CH。mirroredChar（）！= CH）。

trans-unit.source: A block consists of a sequence of text fragments. This class provides a way to iterate over these, and read their contents. It does not provide a way to modify the internal structure or contents of the block.
trans-unit.target: 一个块由一系列的文本片段组成。这个类提供了一种迭代这些文本片段并读取其内容的方法。它不提供修改块的内部结构或内容的方法。

trans-unit.target: 血氧饱和度仪。

trans-unit.target: 血压监测仪。

trans-unit.source: A blur effect blurs the source. This effect is useful for reducing details, such as when the source loses focus and you want to draw attention to other elements. The level of detail can be modified using the setBlurRadius() function. Use setBlurHints() to choose the blur hints.
trans-unit.target: 模糊效果会使源模糊。此效果对于减少细节很有用，例如当源失去焦点并且您想引起其他元素注意时。可以使用setBlurRadius（）函数修改详细程度。使用setBlurHints（）选择模糊提示。

trans-unit.source: A boolean describing if the printer should be full page or not.
trans-unit.target: 描述打印机是否应该为整页的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating if the text in a message box should allow user interfactions (e.g. selection) or not.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示消息框中的文本是否允许用户进行界面操作(如选择)。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating what the to use the border of the buttons (computed as half the button height) for the spacing of the button in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示在消息框中使用按钮的边框(计算为按钮高度的一半)作为按钮的间距。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating whether controls on a title bar ought to update when the mouse is over them.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示当鼠标在标题栏上移动时,标题栏上的控件是否应该更新。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating whether gamma correction is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否启用伽马校正的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating whether the buttons in the message box should be centered or not (see QDialogButtonBox::setCentered()).
trans-unit.target: 表示消息框中的按钮是否应该居中的布尔值(参见QDialogButtonBox::setCentered())。

trans-unit.source: A boolean that describes whether the module was found successfully.
trans-unit.target: 描述是否成功找到该模块的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean that indicates whether the certificate error can be overridden and ignored.
trans-unit.target: 表示证书错误是否可以被覆盖和忽略的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value indicating if the word candidate can be removed from the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示是否可以从字典中删除候选词。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value indicating whether both sides of the printer paper should be used for the printout.
trans-unit.target: 布林值,表示是否应使用双面打印纸进行打印输出。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value indicating whether data for the document's fonts should be embedded in the data sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否应将文档字体数据嵌入发送到打印机的数据中的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value indicating whether or not the printer supports printing multiple copies in one job.
trans-unit.target: 表示打印机是否支持在一项作业中打印多份的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value indicating whether the printout should be collated or not.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否应整理打印输出的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value which, when true, enables single-directory output mode; all generated files go to FORMAT.outputsubdir directory, instead of a subdirectory based on the documentation project name.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，当为 true 时，启用单目录输出模式；所有生成的文件都转到FORMAT.outputsubdir目录，而不是基于文档项目名称的子目录。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value which, when true, enables single-directory output mode; all generated files go to FORMAT.outputsubdir directory, instead of a subdirectory based on the documentation project name.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，当为 true 时，启用单目录输出模式；所有生成的文件都转到FORMAT.outputsubdir目录，而不是基于文档项目名称的子目录。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value which, when true, generates references to quoted content (for example, \quotefromfile and \snippet commands) instead of including the content directly.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，当为 true 时，将生成对引用内容的引用（例如\ quotefromfile和\ snippet命令），而不是直接包含该内容。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value. If true, left clicking on a scroll bar causes the slider to jump to that position. If false, left clicking will behave as appropriate for each control.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值。如果为真,左键点击滚动条会使滑块跳到该位置。如果为false,则左键单击将根据每个控件的情况进行操作。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value. If true, middle clicking on a scroll bar causes the slider to jump to that position. If false, middle clicking is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值。如果为真,中间点击滚动条会使滑块跳到该位置。如果为假,则忽略中间点击。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value. If true, when clicking a scroll bar SubControl, holding the mouse button down and moving the pointer outside the SubControl, the scroll bar continues to scroll. If false, the scollbar stops scrolling when the pointer leaves the SubControl.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值。如果为true，则单击滚动条SubControl时，按住鼠标按钮并将指针移到SubControl外部，滚动条将继续滚动。如果为false，则当指针离开SubControl时，滚动条将停止滚动。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value. If true, when clicking a scroll bar button (SC_ScrollBarAddLine or SC_ScrollBarSubLine) and dragging over to the opposite button (rolling) will press the new button and release the old one. When it is false, the original button is released and nothing happens (like a push button).
trans-unit.target: 布尔值。如果为true，则单击滚动条按钮（SC_ScrollBarAddLine或SC_ScrollBarSubLine）并拖动到相反的按钮（滚动）时，将按下新按钮并释放旧按钮。如果为假，则释放原始按钮，并且没有任何反应（如按钮）。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value. Use toBool() to convert to a bool.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值。使用toBool（）转换为布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A border image is an image that is composed of nine parts (top left, top center, top right, center left, center, center right, bottom left, bottom center, and bottom right). When a border of a certain size is required, the corner parts are used as is, and the top, right, bottom, and left parts are stretched or repeated to produce a border with the desired size.
trans-unit.target: 边框图像是由九个部分(左上角、中上角、右上角、左中角、中角、右中角、左下角、中下角、右下角)组成的图像。当需要一定大小的边框时,角的部分按原样使用,上、右、下、左的部分进行拉伸或重复,就可以得到所需大小的边框。

trans-unit.source: A bounding volume can be provided either as minimum and maximum extent coordinates, or a separate, usually simpler, geometry that approximates the rendered mesh.
trans-unit.target: 边界体积可以以最小和最大范围坐标的形式提供,也可以是一个单独的、通常更简单的、近似于渲染网格的几何体。

trans-unit.source: A box plot chart.
trans-unit.target: 框图图。

trans-unit.source: A box plot legend marker is related to a QBoxPlotSeries object.
trans-unit.target: 箱形图例标记与QBoxPlotSeries对象有关。

trans-unit.source: A box plot series acts as a container for box-and-whiskers items. Items from multiple series are grouped into categories according to their index value.
trans-unit.target: 箱形图系列作为箱形和晶须项目的容器。多个系列中的项目根据其指数值归为一类。

trans-unit.source: A box plot series.
trans-unit.target: 盒子情节系列。

trans-unit.source: A box-and-whiskers item is a graphical representation of a range and three median values that is constructed from five different values. There are two ways to specify the values. The first one is by using a constructor or stream operator (<<). The values have to be specified in the following order: lower extreme, lower quartile, median, upper quartile, and upper extreme.
trans-unit.target: 盒须项目是范围和由五个不同值构成的三个中值的图形表示。有两种指定值的方法。第一个是通过使用构造函数或流运算符（<<）。必须按以下顺序指定值：下极值，下四分位数，中位数，上四分位数和上限。

trans-unit.source: A box-and-whiskers item is a graphical representation of a range and three median values that is constructed from five different values. There are two ways to specify the values. The first one is by using a constructor or the append() method. The values have to be specified in the following order: lower extreme, lower quartile, median, upper quartile, and upper extreme.
trans-unit.target: 盒须项目是范围和由五个不同值构成的三个中值的图形表示。有两种指定值的方法。第一个是通过使用构造函数或append（）方法。必须按以下顺序指定值：下极值，下四分位数，中位数，上四分位数和上限。

trans-unit.source: A brief introduction to regexps is presented, a description of Qt's regexp language, some examples, and the function documentation itself. QRegExp is modeled on Perl's regexp language. It fully supports Unicode. QRegExp can also be used in a simpler,
trans-unit.target: 给出了regexp的简要介绍，Qt regexp语言的描述，一些示例以及函数文档本身。QRegExp基于Perl的正则表达式语言。它完全支持Unicode。QRegExp也可以更简单地使用，

trans-unit.source: A brief introduction to regexps is presented, a description of Qt's regexp language, some examples, and the function documentation itself. QRegExp is modeled on Perl's regexp language. It fully supports Unicode. QRegExp can also be used in a simpler,
trans-unit.target: 简单介绍了regexps,介绍了Qt的regexp语言,一些例子,以及函数文档本身。QRegExp是以Perl的regexp语言为蓝本的。它完全支持Unicode。QRegExp也可以在更简单的情况下使用。

trans-unit.source: A brush has a style, a color, a gradient and a texture.
trans-unit.target: 一个画笔有一个样式,一个颜色,一个渐变和一个纹理。

trans-unit.source: A brush strokes noise effect. More...
trans-unit.target: 笔触会产生噪点效果。更多的...

trans-unit.source: A bug in the OpenGL driver related to framebuffer object (FBO) readbacks may corrupt rendered glyphs. If you set the QML_USE_GLYPHCACHE_WORKAROUND environment variable, Qt keeps an additional copy of the glyph in RAM. This means that performance is slightly lower when drawing glyphs that have not been drawn before, as Qt accesses the extra copy via the CPU. It also means that the glyph cache will use twice as much memory. The quality is not affected by this.
trans-unit.target: OpenGL驱动程序中与帧缓冲对象（FBO）回读有关的错误可能会损坏渲染的字形。如果设置了 QML_USE_GLYPHCACHE_WORKAROUND 环境变量，则Qt会在RAM中保留该字形的其他副本。这意味着当绘制以前未绘制的字形时，性能会稍低，因为Qt通过CPU访问额外的副本。这也意味着字形缓存将使用两倍的内存。质量不受此影响。

trans-unit.source: A busy indicator
trans-unit.target: 繁忙指示灯

trans-unit.source: A busy indicator. More...
trans-unit.target: 繁忙的指示器。更多...

trans-unit.source: A button box used in dialogs. More...
trans-unit.target: 对话框中使用的按钮框。更多...

trans-unit.source: A button can be added to the group with addButton() and removed with removeButton(). If the group is exclusive, the currently checked button is available with checkedButton(). If a button is clicked, the buttonClicked() signal is emitted; for a checkable button in an exclusive group this means that the button has been checked. The list of buttons in the group is returned by buttons().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用addButton（）将按钮添加到组，并使用removeButton（）将按钮删除。如果该组是互斥的，则当前选中的按钮可与checkedButton（）一起使用。如果单击按钮，则发出buttonClicked（）信号；对于排他组中的可检查按钮，这意味着该按钮已被选中。该组中的按钮列表由按钮（）返回。

trans-unit.source: A button can be highlighted in order to draw the user's attention towards it. It has no effect on keyboard interaction.
trans-unit.target: 可以突出显示一个按钮,以吸引用户的注意力。它对键盘交互没有影响。

trans-unit.source: A button can be made the default button in a dialog by means of QPushButton::setDefault() and QPushButton::setAutoDefault().
trans-unit.target: 可以通过QPushButton :: setDefault（）和QPushButton :: setAutoDefault（）将按钮设置为对话框中的默认按钮。

trans-unit.source: A button emits the signal clicked() when it is activated by the user. Connect to this signal to perform the button's action. Buttons also provide the signals canceled(), doubleClicked(), pressed(), released() and pressAndHold() for long presses.
trans-unit.target: 当用户激活按钮时，它会发出clicked（）信号。连接到该信号以执行按钮的操作。按钮还提供信号canceled（），doubleClicked（），pressed（），released（）和pressAndHold（）以便长按。

trans-unit.source: A button might have two states, the pressed state when the user clicks on the button and a released state when the user releases the button. We can assign different property configurations for each state. A transition would animate the change from the pressed state to the released state. Likewise, there would be an animation during the change from the released state to the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: 一个按钮可能具有两种状态，当用户单击按钮时处于 pressed 状态，而在用户释放按钮时处于 released 状态。我们可以为每个状态分配不同的属性配置。过渡将为从 pressed 状态到 released 状态的变化设置动画。同样，在从 released 状态到 pressed 状态的转换过程中将出现动画。

trans-unit.source: A button should have a signal handler with the name onPressAction. This signal may be emitted by an assistive tool such as a screen-reader. The implementation needs to behave the same as a mouse click or tap on the button.
trans-unit.target: 一个按钮应该有一个名为 onPressAction 的信号处理程序。该信号可以由诸如屏幕阅读器之类的辅助工具发出。该实现的行为与单击或单击按钮的行为相同。

trans-unit.source: A button that drops down a grid.
trans-unit.target: 一个按钮,下拉一个网格。

trans-unit.source: A button that drops down a list of items.
trans-unit.target: 一个下拉项目列表的按钮。

trans-unit.source: A button that drops down a menu.
trans-unit.target: 一个下拉菜单的按钮。

trans-unit.source: A button with this property set to true (i.e., the dialog's
trans-unit.target: 属性设置为true的按钮(即对话框的

trans-unit.source: A button.
trans-unit.target: 一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: A cache of generated shader code is maintained. Generated shaders are by defaults saved in QStandardPaths::writableLocation(QStandardPaths::TempLocation)). This path can be overridden by setting environment variable QT3D_WRITABLE_CACHE_PATH to a valid writable path.
trans-unit.target: 维护生成的着色器代码的缓存。默认情况下，生成的着色器保存在QStandardPaths :: writableLocation（QStandardPaths :: TempLocation））中。通过将环境变量QT3D_WRITABLE_CACHE_PATH设置为有效的可写路径，可以覆盖此路径。

trans-unit.source: A calendar may represent years from its first year onwards but provide no way to describe years before its first; such a calendar has no year zero and is not proleptic.
trans-unit.target: 一个日历可以表示从第一年开始的年份,但没有办法描述第一年之前的年份;这样的日历没有0年,也不是无序的。

trans-unit.source: A calendar model
trans-unit.target: 一个日历模型

trans-unit.source: A calendar model. More...
trans-unit.target: 日历模型。更多...

trans-unit.source: A calendar namespace
trans-unit.target: 一个日历命名空间

trans-unit.source: A calendar namespace. More...
trans-unit.target: 日历名称空间。更多...

trans-unit.source: A calendar which represents years before its first may number these years simply by following the usual integer counting, so that the year before the first is year zero, with negative-numbered years preceding this; such a calendar is proleptic and has a year zero. A calendar might also have a year zero (for example, the year of some great event, with subsequent years being the first year after that event, the second year after, and so on) without describing years before its year zero. Such a calendar would have a year zero without being proleptic.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示第一年之前的年份的日历,可以简单地按照通常的整数计算方式对这些年份进行编号,因此第一年之前的年份为零,在这之前的年份为负数;这样的日历是无序的,年份为零。一个历法也可能有一个零年(例如,某个大事件的年份,以后的年份是该事件后的第一年,第二年,以此类推),而不描述其零年之前的年份。这样的日历将有一个零年,但却不具有临界性。

trans-unit.source: A call to this function results in a write request to the remote device. If the operation is successful, the descriptorWritten() signal is emitted; otherwise the DescriptorWriteError is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 对该函数的调用导致对远程设备的写入请求。如果操作成功，则发出descriptorWritten（）信号；否则，发出DescriptorWriteError。

trans-unit.target: 取消的QQuickImageResponse仍然需要发出成品（），使发动机可以清理QQuickImageResponse。

trans-unit.target: 表格中的一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: A cellular phone.
trans-unit.target: 一个手机。

trans-unit.target: 一个居中的标签

trans-unit.source: A central widget will typically be a standard Qt widget such as a QTextEdit or a QGraphicsView. Custom widgets can also be used for advanced applications. You set the central widget with setCentralWidget().
trans-unit.target: 中央小部件通常是标准的Qt小部件，例如QTextEdit或QGraphicsView。自定义窗口小部件也可以用于高级应用程序。您可以使用 setCentralWidget() 设置中央窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: A certificate is considered self-signed its issuer and subject are identical.
trans-unit.target: 如果证书的签发人和主体相同,则视为自签。

trans-unit.source: A certificate is the means of identification used in the SSL process. The local certificate is used by the remote end to verify the local user's identity against its list of Certification Authorities. In most cases, such as in HTTP web browsing, only servers identify to the clients, so the client does not send a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 证书是SSL过程中使用的识别手段。远程端使用本地证书,对照其认证机构列表验证本地用户的身份。在大多数情况下,如在HTTP网络浏览中,只有服务器向客户端进行身份验证,所以客户端不发送证书。

trans-unit.source: A change occurs in the QML scene, causing QQuickItem::update() to be called. This can be the result of for instance an animation or user input. An event is posted to the render thread to initiate a new frame.
trans-unit.target: QML场景中发生更改，导致 QQuickItem::update() 。例如，这可能是动画或用户输入的结果。事件被发布到渲染线程以启动新帧。

trans-unit.source: A character represents itself unless it has a special regexp meaning. e.g. c matches the character
trans-unit.target: 除非具有特殊的正则表达式含义，否则字符表示自身。例如c匹配字符

trans-unit.source: A character that follows a backslash matches the character itself, except as specified below. e.g., To match a literal caret at the beginning of a string, write \^.
trans-unit.target: 除以下指定的字符外，反斜杠后面的字符与字符本身匹配。例如，要匹配字符串开头的文字插入符，请写\ ^。

trans-unit.source: A characteristic belongs to a service if characteristics() contains the
trans-unit.target: 如果特征（）包含以下特征，则该特征属于服务

trans-unit.source: A characteristic can only be read if the service is in the ServiceDiscovered state and belongs to the service. If one of these conditions is not true the QLowEnergyService::OperationError is set.
trans-unit.target: 仅当服务处于ServiceDiscovered状态且属于该服务时，才能读取特征。如果这些条件之一不成立，则设置QLowEnergyService :: OperationError。

trans-unit.source: A characteristic can only be written if this service is in the ServiceDiscovered state and belongs to the service. If one of these conditions is not true the QLowEnergyService::OperationError is set.
trans-unit.target: 仅当此服务处于ServiceDiscovered状态且属于该服务时，才能编写特征。如果这些条件之一不成立，则设置QLowEnergyService :: OperationError。

trans-unit.source: A characteristic is the principal information carrier. It has a value() and properties() describing the access permissions for the value. The general purpose of the contained descriptor is to further define the nature of the characteristic. For example, it might specify how the value is meant to be interpreted or whether it can notify the value consumer about value changes.
trans-unit.target: 特征是主要信息载体。它具有一个value（）和properties（）来描述对该值的访问权限。包含的描述符的一般目的是进一步定义特征的性质。例如，它可以指定如何解释值或是否可以通知值使用者有关值的更改。

trans-unit.source: A chart view does not require a QGraphicsScene object to work. To display a chart in an existing QGraphicsScene, the QChart or QPolarChart class should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 图表视图不需要QGraphicsScene对象即可工作。要在现有QGraphicsScene中显示图表，应改用QChart或QPolarChart类。

trans-unit.source: A check box, like QCheckBox.
trans-unit.target: 一个复选框，例如QCheckBox。

trans-unit.source: A checkable action is one which has an on/off state. For example, in a word processor, a Bold toolbar button may be either on or off. An action which is not a toggle action is a command action; a command action is simply executed, e.g. file save. By default, this property is false.
trans-unit.target: 一种可检查的动作是具有打开/关闭状态的动作。例如，在文字处理器中，粗体工具栏按钮可以打开或关闭。不是切换动作的动作是命令动作。只需执行命令操作，例如文件保存。默认情况下，此属性为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A checkable action toggles between checked (on) and unchecked (off) when triggered.
trans-unit.target: 当触发时,一个可检查的动作会在检查(开启)和未检查(关闭)之间切换。

trans-unit.source: A checkable button that triggers an action when held in long enough
trans-unit.target: 一个可检查的按钮,当按住足够长的时间时,会触发一个动作。

trans-unit.source: A checkable button that triggers an action when held in long enough. More...
trans-unit.target: 一个可检查的按钮，如果按住的时间足够长，就会触发操作。更多...

trans-unit.source: A checkable button toggles between checked (on) and unchecked (off) when the user clicks on it or presses the space bar while the button has active focus.
trans-unit.target: 当用户点击一个可选中的按钮或按下空格键时,该按钮会在选中(开启)和未选中(关闭)之间切换。

trans-unit.source: A checkable menu item has an on/off state. For example, in a word processor, a "Bold" menu item may be either on or off. A menu item that is not checkable is a command item that is simply executed, e.g. file save.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选中的菜单项有一个开启/关闭的状态。例如,在文字处理器中,"粗体 "菜单项可以是打开或关闭。不可勾选的菜单项是一个简单执行的命令项,如文件保存。

trans-unit.source: A checkbox may be in a partially checked state when the regular checked state can not be determined.
trans-unit.target: 当无法确定常规检查状态时,复选框可能处于部分检查状态。

trans-unit.source: A checkbox with a text label
trans-unit.target: 一个带有文本标签的复选框

trans-unit.source: A checkbox with a text label. More...
trans-unit.target: 带有文本标签的复选框。更多...

trans-unit.source: A checked ToggleButton.
trans-unit.target: 选中的ToggleButton。

trans-unit.source: A checked ToggleButton.
trans-unit.target: 一个选中的ToggleButton。

trans-unit.source: A child is added to this item. The value argument is the new child item (i.e., a QGraphicsItem pointer). Do not pass this item to any item's setParentItem() function as this notification is delivered. The return value is unused; you cannot adjust anything in this notification. Note that the new child might not be fully constructed when this notification is sent; calling pure virtual functions on the child can lead to a crash.
trans-unit.target: 一个孩子被添加到该项目。value参数是新的子项（即QGraphicsItem指针）。传递此通知时，请勿将此项目传递给任何项目的setParentItem（）函数。返回值未使用；您无法在此通知中进行任何调整。请注意，发送此通知时，可能无法完全构造新的子代；在子级上调用纯虚函数可能会导致崩溃。

trans-unit.source: A child is removed from this item. The value argument is the child item that is about to be removed (i.e., a QGraphicsItem pointer). The return value is unused; you cannot adjust anything in this notification.
trans-unit.target: 从该项目中删除了一个孩子。value参数是将要删除的子项（即QGraphicsItem指针）。返回值未使用；您无法在此通知中进行任何调整。

trans-unit.source: A child state can override an inherited transition. For example, the following code adds a transition that effectively causes the Quit button to be ignored when the state machine is in state s12.

trans-unit.source: A color can be set by passing an RGB string (such as "#112233"), or an ARGB string (such as "#ff112233") or a color name (such as "blue"), to the setNamedColor() function. The color names are taken from the SVG 1.0 color names. The name() function returns the name of the color in the format "#RRGGBB". Colors can also be set using setRgb(), setHsv() and setCmyk(). To get a lighter or darker color use the lighter() and darker() functions respectively.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过将RGB字符串（例如“＃112233”）或ARGB字符串（例如“＃ff112233”）或颜色名称（例如“ blue”）传递给setNamedColor（）函数来设置颜色。颜色名称取自SVG 1.0颜色名称。该名称（）函数返回的格式为“#RRGGBB”颜色的名字。还可以使用setRgb（），setHsv（）和setCmyk（）设置颜色。要获得较浅或较深的颜色，请分别使用lighter（）和darker（）函数。

trans-unit.source: A color is normally specified in terms of RGB (red, green, and blue) components, but it is also possible to specify it in terms of HSV (hue, saturation, and value) and CMYK (cyan, magenta, yellow and black) components. In addition a color can be specified using a color name. The color name can be any of the SVG 1.0 color names.
trans-unit.target: 颜色通常用RGB(红、绿、蓝)成分来指定,但也可以用HSV(色相、饱和度和数值)和CMYK(青、品红、黄、黑)成分来指定。此外,还可以使用颜色名称来指定颜色。颜色名称可以是SVG 1.0的任何颜色名称。

trans-unit.source: A color space can generally speaking be conceived as a combination of set of primary colors and a transfer function. The primaries defines the axes of the color space, and the transfer function how values are mapped on the axes. The primaries are defined by three primary colors that represent exactly how red, green, and blue look in this particular color space, and a white color that represents where and how bright pure white is. The range of colors expressable by the primary colors is called the gamut, and a color space that can represent a wider range of colors is also known as a wide-gamut color space.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,色彩空间可以被设想为一组原色和一个传递函数的组合。原色定义了色彩空间的轴,而传递函数则定义了数值如何在轴上映射。原色是由三种原色定义的,这三种原色确切地代表了红、绿、蓝在这个特定的色彩空间中的样子,还有一种白色,代表了纯白色的位置和亮度。原色所能表达的颜色范围称为色域,能代表更多颜色范围的色彩空间也称为宽色域色彩空间。

trans-unit.source: A color to indicate a selected item or the current item.
trans-unit.target: 表示所选项目或当前项目的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A color type has r, g, b and a properties that refer to the red, green, blue and alpha values of the color, respectively. Additionally it has hsvHue, hsvSaturation, hsvValue and hslHue, hslSaturation, hslLightness properties, which allow access to color values in HSV and HSL color models accordingly:

trans-unit.target: 使用DCI-P3原色的色彩空间，但具有sRGB的白点和传递功能。在现代宽色域屏幕中很常见。DCI-P3的ICC注册

trans-unit.source: A combo box, like QComboBox.
trans-unit.target: 一个组合框，例如QComboBox。

trans-unit.source: A combobox can be populated using the insert functions, insertItem() and insertItems() for example. Items can be changed with setItemText(). An item can be removed with removeItem() and all items can be removed with clear(). The text of the current item is returned by currentText(), and the text of a numbered item is returned with text(). The current item can be set with setCurrentIndex(). The number of items in the combobox is returned by count(); the maximum number of items can be set with setMaxCount(). You can allow editing using setEditable(). For editable comboboxes you can set auto-completion using setCompleter() and whether or not the user can add duplicates is set with setDuplicatesEnabled().
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用插入函数insertItem（）和insertItems（）来填充组合框。可以使用setItemText（）更改项目。可以使用removeItem（）删除项目，而可以使用clear（）删除所有项目。当前项目的文本由currentText（）返回，而编号项目的文本与text（）返回。可以使用setCurrentIndex（）设置当前项目。组合框中的项目数由count（）返回；可以使用setMaxCount（）设置最大项目数。您可以使用setEditable进行编辑（）。对于可编辑的组合框，您可以使用设置自动完成setCompleter（），并且用户可以添加重复是否被设定setDuplicatesEnabled（）。

trans-unit.source: A combobox is a selection widget that displays the current item, and can pop up a list of selectable items. A combobox may be editable, allowing the user to modify each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 组合框是一个显示当前项目的选择部件,可以弹出一个可选择项目的列表。组合框可以是可编辑的,允许用户修改列表中的每个项目。

trans-unit.source: A command button is rectangular and typically displays a text label describing its action. A shortcut key can be specified by preceding the preferred character with an ampersand in the text. For example:

trans-unit.source: A command can be marked obsolete with the QUndoCommand::setObsolete() function. The QUndoCommand::isObsolete() flag is checked in QUndoStack::push(), QUndoStack::undo(), QUndoStack::redo(), and QUndoStack::setIndex() after calling QUndoCommand::undo(), QUndoCommand::redo() and QUndoCommand:mergeWith() where applicable.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用QUndoCommand :: setObsolete（）函数将命令标记为过时。该QUndoCommand :: isObsolete（）标志的检验中QUndoStack ::推（），QUndoStack ::撤消（），QUndoStack ::重做（）和QUndoStack :: setIndex调用后（）QUndoCommand ::撤消（），QUndoCommand： ：redo（）和QUndoCommand：mergeWith（）（如果适用）。

trans-unit.source: A command macro is a sequence of commands, all of which are undone and redone in one go. Command macros are created by giving a command a list of child commands. Undoing or redoing the parent command will cause the child commands to be undone or redone. Command macros may be created explicitly by specifying a parent in the QUndoCommand constructor, or by using the convenience functions beginMacro() and endMacro().
trans-unit.target: 命令宏是一系列命令，所有命令一次都被撤消和重做。通过为命令提供子命令列表来创建命令宏。撤消或重做父命令将导致子命令被撤消或重做。可以通过在QUndoCommand构造函数中指定一个父级，或使用便利函数beginMacro（）和endMacro（）显式创建命令宏。

trans-unit.source: A command or shell fragment prepended to each test command. An example use-case is a "timeout" script which will terminate a test if it does not complete within a specified time.
trans-unit.target: 每条测试命令前面都有一个命令或shell片段。一个例子是 "超时 "脚本,如果测试没有在指定时间内完成,它将终止测试。
